What it is: A pro liquid liner formula that provides long-lasting, waterproof definition with an effortless flexible tip.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This liquid liner is extremely pigmented and features a super sharp, flexible felt tip for ultimate control. The bulletproof formula grips the lid and is completely smudge-proof for bold and lasting definition.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-In front of a mirror, rest your elbow on a flat surface, and tilt your head up so you have ultimate control for application.
-When applying false lashes, use liquid liner as a final step to conceal the lash band.

column8:
What it is:
A long-wearing gel liner that applies with a brush for foolproof application.

What it does:
Fluidline's ultra-smooth gel formula provides the precision of a liquid liner with a silkier, softer finish. It goes on foolproof with a brush in an easy dip-and-stroke action. Long-wearing for up to 16 hours and smudge-proof, it lines up in a rich array of colors and finishes.

What else you need to know:
This waterproof, non-acnegenic formula is ophthalmologist and dermatologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Line the lash line with Fluidline using an eye liner brush.

What it is:
A super-rich, creamy moisturizer that hydrates, feeds, and firms the look of skin.

What it does:
This super-rich, creamy moisturizer features skin-nourishing extracts, including passion fruit, spinach leaf, green tea, algae, wheat germ, and coconut. It supports a healthy radiance, diminishes the appearance of fine lines, and can be used both day and night.

This product is dermatologist-tested, ophthalmologist-tested, and non-acnegenic.

Suggested Usage:
-Apply desired amount of product to fingertips and blend over face.

What it is: A palette of go-to universal metallic shadows that creates endless eye looks in 12 creamy, luxurious shades that melt onto the lids.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This palette is inspired by Mario’s love of nature. The creamy shadows deliver a range of chromatic effects from natural to intense, with high-impact shine. The luxe formula can be used dry or wet to achieve a light wash or full-coverage color.

This Set Contains:
- 12 x 0.03 oz/ 1 g Eyeshadows in Metallic 1 (warm sparkling gold), Metallic 2 (warm rose), Metallic 3 (deep bronze), Metallic 4 (gleaming teal), Metallic 5 (warm pearl), Metallic 6 (shimmering olive green), Metallic 7 (sheer copper), Metallic 8 (pale gold), Metallic 9 (warm garnet), Metallic 10 (warm bronze), Metallic 11 (warm berry), Metallic 12 (smokey slate),

Palette size: 5.3” x 0.7” x 2.9” (full size)
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply this shadow with your fingers to achieve a quick, allover, beautiful intensity.
-For more detailed application, use the E 4 brush (sold separately) to pat and build the shadow. Wet the brush for extra intensity.
-Use Master Eye Prep & Set™ (sold separately) as a base for superior grip and buildability.
-Lighter shades like Metallic 1, Metallic 5, Metallic 7, and Metallic 8 also work as a face and body highlighter.
-For an amplified metallic finish, you can pat Master Secret Glow™ (sold separately) below or over your shadow with your fingers.

column8:
What it is:
A long-handled, stainless steel, double loop extractor.

What it does:
This tool features a small loop for white heads and a flat side to extract blackheads.

What else you need to know:
A deep, cystic pimple should not be opened with a loop extractor. When dealing with deep acne, it's best to visit a dermatologist. A doctor may use a sterile needle, but only after a pustule has formed. Additional treatments depend on the severity of the acne.

What else you need to know:
This product was not tested on animals.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Prior to using the Double Ended Blemish Extractor, steaming the face, or using a hot water compress is strongly recommended to help soften comedones.
-This will make them much easier to remove.
-When you're ready to begin the extraction process lay the preferred side on top of the blemish - basically encircling this area with the loop.
-Apply slow and even pressure lightly until the trapped sebum is forced out of the follicle.
-Do not continue to attempt the extraction if the trapped sebum is not released easily.
-Applying too much force can cause infection and scarring.
-Use the small loop for whiteheads and the flat side for blackheads.

When dealing with deep acne, it's best to visit a dermatologist. A doctor may use a sterile needle, but only after a pustule has formed. Additional treatments depend on the severity of the acne.What else you need to know:This product was not tested on animals.

column8:
What it is: A palette to prime, prep, conceal, and set for a flawless and long-wearing look.

Ingredient callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Each set features two shades of primer for custom blending in hues for different skin tones and a translucent powder to set the lids and diffuse shadow. The convenient kit corrects shadow mistakes, provides a shadow base, and is perfect for touch-ups on the go.

This set contains:
- 2 x 0.06 oz/ 1.7g Primer
- 1 x 0.12 oz/ 3.4g Powder
column9:
Suggested Usage:
- Don’t be concerned with getting a perfect match. You can custom blend a shade to match your skin tone, but Mario always recommends priming with a shade lighter than the lid.
-To prime the eye, choose one shade or mix your own, and then apply it to the lid using the flat end of the double-sided EF 1 brush (sold separately). You can also use the creamy primer to cut your crease and shape the brow.
-To set the lid, tap powder on top of the primer using the fluffy side of the EF 1 brush. You can also use the powder to smooth, perfect, and diffuse the edges of the shadow.
-This product can be used as a face touch-up when needed throughout the day.

column8:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A moisturizer whose ingredients fight against the effects of time and blur the look of fine lines.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Pores

If you want to know more…
Mineralize Timecheck Lotion features new, innovative polymer technology that creates the optical illusion of blurred fine lines and wrinkles, while helping to diminish the look of pores and make skin look plumper while instantly mattifying and priming the skin. It’s formulated with MAC’s signature Charged Water Technology to saturate skin with immediate and long-term hydration and mineral-rich yeast extract to nourish the complexion with a blend of essential minerals. Delivered in a unique gel-lotion formula that feels like a cooling, refreshing splash of water, it can be applied as a primer for makeup that glides like silk on top.

This hydrating formula smooths the look of skin while creating a look of radiance. The soothing formula is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested, non-acnegenic, and suitable for all skin types.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply directly onto face until absorbed.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know:This gel-based body luminizer leaves skin feeling dewy, and has light-diffusing micropearls with a sheer tint of color designed for all skin tones. Delivered in a generously sized bottle, Body Lava’s ultimate drenched-in-light radiance—plus its addictive floral vanilla scent—was born to dew your body right.

What it is:
The ultimate quick fix for skin, this moisturizer that boosts the look of dull skin and luminizes with iridescent particles.

Coverage:
✔ Light

Skin type:
✔ Sensitive
✔ Normal
✔ Dry
✔ Combination
✔ Oily

Finish:
✔ Radiant

What it does:
Strobe cream boosts the look of dull, flat, or tired-looking skin with nutritious vitamins and a mega-dose of green tea. It brightens and clarifies with iridescent particles and antioxidants. The formula provides radiance while hydrating—adds the softest glow to skin. Pearlescent particles enhance the look of healthy skin and improve luminosity and evenness, while actives provide hydration.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested, ophthalmologist tested, and non-acnegenic.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply directly to skin with fingertips.
-For a more subtle glow, apply under foundation. For more intensity, apply on top of foundation
-Try using multiple shades for a strobe ombre effect.
-Mix Strobe Cream with your favorite liquid or cream foundation for a natural glow.

What it is:
A pen-style highlighter that efficiently brings a soft, sheer wash of color to the skin.

What it does:
With its precision application, Prep + Prime Highlighter adds radiance just where you want it. The formula goes on smoothly for cushion-soft wear. Use it over makeup for highlights or touch-ups, or under makeup to brighten and prime.

Prep + Prime Highlighter provides instant radiance that is lightweight, long-wearing, and non-drying. It is dermatologist-tested, ophthalmologist-tested, and non-acnegenic.
column9:

-Apply directly with brush tip to the high planes of the face.
-Use over bare, moisturized skin or on top of concealer or foundation.
-Blend well with fingertips.

What it is:
A shine-stopping, pore-diffusing primer that smooths the way for better foundation application and longer wear with an instant retouch effect.

What it does:
Nothing is sexier than touch-worthy skin. Pro Filt’r Instant Retouch Primer is the first step to getting there. Paired with Pro Filt'r Foundation, this oil-free primer smooths away the look of pores, visibly evens skin tone and texture, and instantly absorbs shine without feeling dry or chalky. That means smoother foundation application and longer makeup wear.

Unlike a basic mattifying primer, Pro Filt’r’s cushiony, touch-me-now texture mattifies skin with the lightest possible feel for a full-on sensorial experience. The universal invisipink™ formula creates a filter-like blurring effect and melts instantly into all skin tones without a trace. Pro Filt’r works all day to help makeup last longer, and feel lightweight and comfortable, so you don’t have to worry about your skin—and you’ll be ready for anything.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
For Rihanna, creating the perfect soft matte base is the most important part of any look—and the first step to the Fenty Face, her real-life method for killer radiance.

"I wanted this primer to feel soft and moisturizing at the same time, as well as do the job of keeping makeup on."—Rihanna, Brand Founder

Fenty Beauty is 100 percent cruelty-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-One pump is all it takes for an instant retouch effect.
-Start at the center of your face and blend outward.
-For the ultimate first step to the FENTY Face, follow with Pro Filt’r Hydrating Longwear Foundation for a natural finish, or Pro Filt’r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation for a soft matte finish (each sold separately).
-Artistry Pro Tip: If you have dry skin, apply primer to just the areas of your face that tend to get oily (think T-zone and around the mouth).
-You can also try Pro Filt’r Mattifying Primer, for normal to oily skin types and Pro Filt'r Hydrating Primer for normal to dry skin types (each sold separately).

What it is:
A gloss in a wide color range that can create a glass-like finish or a subtle sheen.

What it does:
Designed to be worn on its own or over lip pencil or lipstick, it's the perfect product for creating shine that lasts. It's pigmented, very shiny, and can impart subtle or dramatic color. It contains jojoba oil to help soften and condition the lips.

What else you need to know:
All Little MAC products are totally tote-able in an airport-friendly size.

-Apply to lips using the doe foot applicator.
-For fuller-looking lips, concentrate the Lipglass in the center of the lips.
-Apply on top of your favorite lipstick to add a high shine effect with intense color.

column8:
What it is: A dual-ended, triangular-shaped, retractable brow pencil and tinted brow gel that creates naturally defined brows.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Creamy and buildable, this ultra-precise pencil creates any brow look—from soft and defined to strong and full. Set the shape with a weightless, tinted brow gel that lifts and holds without feeling stiff or crunchy. Brow Harmony is available in shades designed to complement every hair color.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
To create definition:
-Twist the pencil component to reveal product (do not twist too high, pencil could break due to the creamy nature of the formula).
-Hold the pencil so it's angled against the skin and then use small, short strokes to mimic the look of natural hairs.

To create volume and set:
-Comb tinted gel through brow hairs in the direction of hair growth to set and hold.

A slow-baked powder with M·A·C Multi-Mineral Complex that provides a natural, dimensional finish.

What it does:
This luxurious, slow-baked domed face powder with low-level pearlized pigments provides a dimensional yet natural-satin finish. Featuring the M·A·C Multi-Mineral Complex and vitamin E, it can be used to set foundation and to touch-up makeup throughout the day and is perfect for contouring the face and body.

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested and non-acnegenic.

-Apply to face using a brush as desired.

A luxurious powder with M·A·C Multi-Mineral Complex that adds highlights to the face and body.

What it does:
This luxurious, slow-baked, velvety-soft, domed face powder offers a radiant finish. Strategically buff on to add highlights to the high points of the face, or blend all over for a sheer luminous polish to the skin. It features the M·A·C Multi-Mineral Complex and vitamin E.

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested and non-acnegenic. After adding product on your brush, mist brush with Prep + Prime Fix + and apply to high planes of face for a more intense, metallic highlight.

column8:
What it is:
An industry-strength oil-based makeup remover that's gentle on the skin.

What it does:
An industry-strength oil-based makeup remover that is gentle on the skin. Botanically formulated with oils of olive fruit, evening primrose and jojoba seed and completely free of mineral oil. Massages onto skin to loosen all makeup, including waterproof mascara. Emulsifies upon contact with water and then rinses off cleanly and easily, leaving skin feeling soft. The formula features natural oils to remove long-wearing and waterproof products.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested, ophthalmologist tested, and non-acnegenic.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to dry face and gently massage using fingertips.
-Rinse thoroughly.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Citrus & Fruits

Key Notes: Bergamot, Coriander, Green Tea

Fragrance Description: This scent has bright Italian bergamot citrus notes that mingle with the earthy, green tea accord at its heart. It combines with the warmth of beeswax and tonka bean, emitting a spirit that radiates serenity and refreshes the senses with a scent that can be worn by men or women.

About the Bottle: This fragrance is presented in a tall decanter that highlights the light liquid within and is accented with an elegant gold-toned neck and signature cap, crafted to display the Bulgari inscription.

About the Fragrance: The Eau Parfumée collection is a luxury unisex fragrance for men and women. They were originally developed to be gifts for VIP clients, but they have become a Bulgari signature scent collection, immediately recognizable worldwide.
column9: Spray fragrance on pulse points (neck, wrists, décolleté) preferably after showering or applying lotion as scent will last longer on hydrated skin. Keep fragrance out of direct sunlight and away from extreme temperatures to keep integrity of the perfume.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight water mist that finishes makeup, while gently soothing and refreshing skin.

What it does:
Prep + Prime Fix+ is packed with vitamins and minerals, and is infused with a blend of green tea, chamomile, and cucumber to gently soothe and refresh the skin. It supports skin’s natural hydration while delivering a soft sheen to refresh and finish makeup. This holy grail of hydrating mists can be used with other products in near-endless ways—to sheer out the look of foundation, intensify color, improve and extend the wear of makeup, or moisturize and soothe tired skin.

This product is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested, and is non-acnegenic.

Beauty Tips:
Apply your favorite powder foundation and lightly mist Prep + Prime Fix+ all over the face to set and hydrate.

Apply your favorite eye shadow or pigment to your preferred brush, lightly mist the bristles with Prep + Prime Fix+, and sweep across lids for an intensified shadow look.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Hold bottle 12 inches away from face and spray evenly.
-Use alone or to finish makeup.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy

Scent Type: Woody Spices

Key Notes: Sandalwood, Tonka Bean

Fragrance Description: A tribute to the elegance and style of the Italian man, Pour Homme is an olfactory portrait projecting onto the collective imagination the iconic power of irresistible sex appeal and tenderness. The fragrance opens up with neroli and citrusy hints of mandarin and bergamot. At the heart is lavender, which—like a Mediterranean breeze—evokes a mother‘s fresh laundry and the classic essence of a father. Touches of tobacco and tonka bean provide structure for the last dry notes of wood.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

✔ Normal
✔ Oily

What it is:
A professional, body scrub used in Vinotherapie Spas, this brown sugar scrub exfoliate, moisturizes and visibly targets the appearance cellulite and stretch marks.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more…
This natural, wine-inspired body scrub provides strong exfoliation, drains, refines, softens, and nourishes the skin as it imparts intense hydration and a satiny finish. Skin is left smooth and silky.

Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply the scrub to damp skin.
-Massage in a circular motion over the entire body.
-Rinse well.

Recycling Instructions:
-Packaging recyclable through TerraCycle®.
-As a pioneer of sustainable beauty, Caudalie is committed to reducing packaging waste for all new and existing products by end of 2022, using less plastic, paper and metal to create recycled, recyclable or refillable packaging.

column8:
What it is:
An all-in-one, cheek duo that delivers a healthy-looking, bronzed glow and brilliant flush of color for a touch of sunkissed radiance.

What it does:
This duo is the perfect pairing of the iconic NARS blush with the cult-classic bronzer. Beloved by editors and makeup artists alike, this must-have cheek duo delivers a variety of effects for a healthy-looking, bronzed glow with a brilliant flush of blush. Enliven your complexion with a multidimensional glow. Infused with transparent pigments that are lightweight on skin, the micronized powder and silky texture ensures a smooth, blendable application. It imparts sheer, buildable coverage with a soft, shimmery finish.

What else you need to know:
Orgasm/Laguna features Orgasm Blush, a peachy pink infused with golden shimmer that delivers a universally flattering rush of color suitable for all skintones. The iconic, award-winning Laguna Bronzer gives your skin a glow with a touch of shimmer.

Sin/Casino is perfect for deeper skintones. Sin Blush is a highly pigmented, soft, sheer powder in cool berry with golden sheen. Casino Bronzer is a rich brown with golden shimmer that adds warmth to your skin. Together, they deliver a soft, sunkissed look.

"When it comes to blush, how and where you apply it is more important than what color you use."—François Nars, Founder and Creative Director of NARS Cosmetics
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Artist tips to create definition:
-Starting at the temple, sweep the deeper shade along the hairline, under the cheekbones, and along the jawline. If desired, finish the look by applying the same shade along the sides of the nose.
- To highlight, apply the lighter shade on tops of cheekbones, brow bones, and down the center of the nose.

-To contour, get definition by starting at the temple and sweeping along the hairline, under the cheekbone, and down the jawline.
-To highlight, glide over areas where the sun hits naturally: the tops of the cheekbones, on temples, and on the bridge of the nose.
-To let color pop, swipe it onto the apples of the cheeks and swirl in a circular motion, layering to your desired intensity.

column8:
What it is: An ultra-fluid, water-resistant foundation that blends full coverage with a lightweight formula, providing airbrushed perfection for up to 12 hours.

Coverage: Full

Finish: Radiant

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product also comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Enriched with light-diffusing pigments, this foundation smooths the look of skin and gives the complexion a radiant, perfected look that lasts all day. The unique micro-diffusion spray system delivers a fine mist of foundation to provide a soft, velvety complexion. The water-resistant formula ensures up to 12 hours of hold and colors that stay true. The ultra-fluid and ultra-fine texture allows for buildable, custom coverage to suit any skin tone and texture.

Clinical Results: In an instrumental test on 20 people:
- The water-resistant formula stayed color-true for up to 12 hours
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake the can for five seconds.
-Hold your arm at a 90-degree angle, and spray from approximately eight inches directly onto the face in a Z formation.
-Alternatively, spray onto the Dior Backstage Buffing Brush (sold separately), and apply in small, circular motions to the face, gently dabbing onto areas that require more coverage.
-Repeat as needed until you achieve your desired coverage.

column8:
What it is:
A multiactive, antiaging treatment for the eye area that firms, brightens, and hydrates to minimize the appearance of medium to deep wrinkles and crows feet.

What it is formulated to do:
Renewing Eye Cream firms, brightens, and hydrates to minimize signs of aging at the delicate eye area. Youth-building peptides and retinol support natural collagen and reduce the appearance of medium to deep wrinkles. Eye-brightening complex helps reduce dark circles and under-eye puffiness while illuminating the eye area to refresh skin’s natural glow. Phytoestrogens, including iris root extract, improve elasticity and help smooth skin. Renewing Eye Cream is recommended as a step two treatment in any Murad resurgence regimen and minimizes eye area aging as part of Dr. Murad’s Inclusive Health® system of care.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
RepleniCell™, Murad’s patent-pending, proprietary technology, helps skin act younger in three ways: it helps skin attract water; it binds water to the skin; and it helps skin retain water. This product is dermatologist developed, scientifically proven, and is not tested on animals.

Research results:
Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Gently pat a small amount onto the browbone and beneath the eye.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Avoid contact with eyes.
-Keep out of reach of children.

column8:
What it is:
A decadent body cleanser that is rich in almond oil and features a foaming oil-to-milk texture that leaves skin satiny-smooth.

What it is formulated to do:
Start moisturizing in the shower with this indulgent cleanser. The shower oil contains almond oil, naturally rich in omega 6 fatty acids to help soften the skin. The unique formula transforms into a milky foam upon contact with water, leaving a mouthwatering scent of fresh almonds for a true moment of delight. This oil also makes a great base for shaving.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Almonds are an incredibly delicate fruit to grow: the best almonds require cool air without ever freezing. L'Occitane almonds are sourced from a very special region in Haute Provence, where some of the most delicious and nutritious almonds grow. L'Occitane supports the sustainability of almond trees in the region, as these trees, while difficult to grow, are a staple to the beauty of the Provencal landscape.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to damp skin, lather, and rinse.
-Also works perfectly for shaving.

column8:
What it is: A lightweight, easy-to-apply, loose powder that blends effortlessly to set makeup for up to 16 hours of wear.

What Else You Need to Know: This award-winning powder locks in makeup for long-lasting wear without adding weight or texture. It absorbs oil and reduces shine all day, creating a flawless, matte finish with no flashback in photos. These truly-translucent shades work on all skin tones, and create a soft-focus effect to subtly blur fine lines and imperfections.
Translucent is perfect for fair to medium and tan skin tones.
Translucent Honey is perfect for medium skin tones with olive and golden undertones.
Translucent Medium Deep is perfect for medium-deep to deep skin tones.

Clinical Results: TLSP was shown to have:
- No flashback in photos
- 16-hour long-wear
- Shine control up to 8 hours
In a consumer test on 32 women after 2 weeks:
- 100% said it is lightweight and does not look cakey on skin
- 100% said it controls and reduces shine
- 97% said it absorbs excess oil
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Prep Laura Mercier’s Velour Puff (sold separately) by massaging Translucent Loose Setting Powder into the puff, folding both halves together
-Tap the powdered side on the back of your hand to remove excess.
-Fold the puff in half and gently press and roll the puff onto skin to set your makeup. Around the eyes, use Laura Mercier’s Secret Brightening Powder for Under Eyes (sold separately).
-Focus on the areas where makeup breaks down the most.
-Apply after any creamy formulas, including cream blush.
-Tip: Renowned Makeup Artist Laura Mercier uses it to set foundation and prolong its wear. She applies it after foundation and concealer, and before applying powder-based color. As an added benefit, it eases the application of powder blush or bronzer.

column8:
What it is:
A transparent, weightless powder to set under-eye concealer, brighten dark circles, and diminish the look of fine lines.

What it does:
Create the appearance of naturally-perfected skin, while maximizing the wear and coverage of makeup. This transparent under-eye setting powder brightens, lightens, and creates a look of luminosity. Formulated with light-reflecting, micronized pigments, this super-soft, weightless powder delivers a soft, radiant finish and resists settling into fine lines, accentuating shadows, or building up on skin.

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested. It is perfect for all skin types, even sensitive ones.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Using the Camouflage Powder Brush (sold separately), pat over makeup or onto lids. Try not to drag the brush over skin.

Precautions:
-Because this powder contains white pigment, don't use it on the entire face. Keep to areas to be lightened and brightened around the eyes.

column8:
What it is:
A water-resistant eyelid primer that camouflages imperfections and discolorations, while it enhances the durability of eye makeup.

What it does:
Eye Basics provides the perfect canvas for eyelids to help eye color stay on longer. The highly versatile formula is water-resistant and crease-proof. Its sheer, creamy texture blends easily and smoothly, leaving a long-lasting, semi-matte finish.

What else you need to know:
Use as an eyelid primer or alone to color correct and cover imperfections. Its skin-friendly ingredients enhance the delicate skin on the eyelids while botanicals soothe and vitamins A, E, and C provide antioxidant protection. The Eyebright shade makes the white of the eyes brighter and lighter. The Peach shade is perfect for darker skin tones.

This product is free of fragrance.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Choose a shade that matches your skin tone and apply to eyelid with wand. Blend with clean fingertips.

column8:
What it is:
A specially designed setting application puff with a soft, luxurious texture that molds and conforms as needed to pick up, hold, and apply setting powder.

What it does:
The Velour Puff was created by Laura Mercier to be used to apply the iconic Translucent Loose Setting Powder to create a soft-focus, matte finish. It easily conforms to the contours of your face to set the powder for lasting wear.

What else you need to know:
The Velour Puff can be washed with mild soap or machine washed in a lingerie bag. The Translucent Loose Setting Powder is sold separately.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Laura Mercier’s Technique:
-Saturate the Velour Puff with Translucent Loose Setting Powder.
-Remove excess powder by tapping the puff on top of your hand.
-Gently press puff on the skin, using a rolling motion to "work" the powder into the skin to set makeup.
-The key is to not see powder when you put it on; the result is soft-focus skin with a matte finish.
-Use it for application to all areas of the face.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Warm Floral

Key Notes: Osmanthus Blossom, Heart of Musk, Patchouli

Fragrance Description: Embark on a journey into a heart of musk with all its multiple facets and discover a mysterious essence for an unforgettable woman graced with sophistication and femininity. The blend of floral, amber, and woody notes expresses a subtle elegance that captures the senses and leaves a timeless, tender trail.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

The blend of floral, amber, and woody notes expresses a subtle elegance that captures the senses and leaves a timeless, tender trail.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

column8:
What it is:
An emollient-based balm that conditions lips, locks in moisture, and gives a soft shine.

What it does:
This emollient-based balm conditions lips and locks in moisture. It acts as a perfect base for lipsticks and helps lip pencils to glide on. Worn on its own, it imparts a soft shine to the lips while hydrating, nourishing, and conditioning.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply desired amount of product to lips directly from tube.

What it is: A vegan mascara that delivers a 35 percent increase in curl while also lengthening, volumizing, and conditioning lashes for 24-hr smudge-proof, flake-free wear.

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Olive Esters: Condition, treat, and protect lashes.
- Rice Bran Wax: Natural wax that helps lengthen the appearance of lashes.
- Carnauba Wax: An emollient from the leaves of the carnauba palm to ensure a smooth application.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and triclosan. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This multi-benefit mascara delivers darker, longer, thicker lashes to make your eyes appear bigger and brighter. It also conditions your lashes with olive esters, rice bran, and pro vitamin B5—it’s the ultimate lash nutrition.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Wedge the wand at the base of lashes and pull out in a zig zag motion to reach every last lash.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Florals

Scent Type: Warm Florals

Key Notes: Bamboo, Lotus Blossom

Fragrance Description: Inspired by the soft glow and reflection that emanates from a cut crystal gem, the scent of Omnia Crystalline illuminates and reveals a woman’s unique radiance. This luminous, woody floral fragrance captures the sweet transparency of the lotus flower, the freshness of nashi pear, and the creaminess of balsa wood.

About the Bottle: This fragrance is housed in a now-iconic bottle, with intertwining rings that symbolize infinity and abundance, to be displayed as a precious jewel. It makes the perfect perfume gift for the bride-to-be to wear on her special day, surrounded by all who love her.

About the Fragrance: This is a fresh, floral eau de toilette that pays tribute to the richness and diversity of Nature. It was crafted by master perfumer Alberto Morillas.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Spray fragrance on pulse points (neck, wrists, décolleté) preferably after showering or applying lotion as scent will last longer on hydrated skin. For a lighter wear, scent a favorite scarf or spray into the air and “walk” through, allowing it to envelope you. Keep fragrance out of direct sunlight and away from extreme temperatures to keep integrity of the perfume.

column8:
What it is: A hydrating, nourishing balm with a buildable, light-to-medium dose of color and a natural dewy finish.

Formulation: Lip Balm & Treatment

Benefits: Hydrating

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: With a buildable dose of dewy color, this tinted lip balm wraps lips in weightless hydration that lasts all day, so they feel nourished and nurtured. With shea butter and a botanical blend of lotus, gardenia, and white waterlily, it cushions lips while building color so they look fuller and healthier.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
- Swipe it on whenever, wherever. Repeat for more color.
-TIP: You can even wear it under or over your favorite lip products for a quick moisture boost.

column8:
What it is:
A makeup primer that's specifically beneficial for oily and combination skin types.

What it does:
A silky gel emulsion, rich in natural ingredients, Prep + Prime Natural Radiance hydrates and primes to improve foundation or powder application, control oil, and promote smooth texture. Vitamins E and C protect with antioxidants, while caffeine calms skin. Illuminating pearl powders reflect optic radiance. The formula disappears upon application, resulting in a beautiful glow. The formula controls shine, provides long-term hydration, and improves radiance while smoothing and softening the look of skin.

What else you need to know:
This product is silicone-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Smooth evenly all over the face or to the desired areas after moisturizer (right before foundation) with fingertips, sponge, or brush.

What it is: An antioxidant-rich, vegan face mist that uses 100 percent grape water to deliver intense hydration, reduce redness and soothe sensitive skin .
Skin Type: Normal and Dry

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Spray

Highlighted Ingredients:
- 100 percent Grape Water: Moisturizes, soothes, and acts as an antioxidant.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Meet your favorite hydrating face mist now with new, sustainable packaging. Its formula with 100 percent grape water that’s also rich in minerals, potassium, and moisturizing polysaccharides quickly delivers intense hydration and soothes even the most sensitive skin. Its prebiotic powers support the skin barrier.

Clinical Results: In a corneometry on 12 volunteers, results included:
- 127% immediate increase in hydration

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Spritz on as a toner to clean face or at any time of the day to soothe, refresh, and moisturize skin.
-It quickly absorbs into skin, no need to blot.

Recycling Instructions:
-Bottle is 100 percent recyclable, and cap is recyclable through Terracycle®.
-As a pioneer of sustainable beauty, Caudalie is committed to reducing packaging waste for all new and existing products by end of 2022, using less plastic, paper and metal to create recycled, recyclable or refillable packaging.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Fruity Floral

Key Notes: Rose, Musk, Patchouli

Fragrance Description: for her Eau de Parfum maintains musk as its heart note, just like the other for her perfumes. Peach and rose are added to make this fragrance truly velvety. Meanwhile, a veil of soft amber and wood adds mystery and depth to the composition.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is: A dermatologist-developed liquid exfoliating lotion that clears the way for smoother, brighter-looking skin.

Skin Type: Dry

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Witch Hazel: Visibly refines skin.
- Acetyle Glucosamine: Balances and smooths skin.
- Salicylic Acid: Helps exfoliate the surface of the skin and enhance cell turnover.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This gentle, refreshing formula is the difference maker for healthy skin. Clarifying Lotion 1 sweeps away pollution, grime, and dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin. Its exfoliating preps skin for moisturizer, making it more receptive to hydration and treatment products. For drier skin, twice-daily exfoliation helps remove surface flakes that can be a barrier to moisture absorption. Clarifying Lotion 1 even helps the look of fine, dry lines disappear.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.
-For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.
-Follow with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, Gel or Jelly (sold separately).

What it is:
A luxurious, butter-rich body cream that softens dryness-prone skin.

What it is formulated to do:
So silky, skin drinks it up instantly, this moisturizer penetrates dryness-prone skin, delivering a new kind of softness to elbows, knees, heels. It absorbs easily, providing instant comfort and hydration so that skin stays soothed and comforted all day.

What else you need to know:
This product is ideal for all skin types and is particularly suitable for very dry skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply liberally to clean, towel-dried skin after showering, bathing or whenever skin needs a moisture boost.
-Pay particular attention to rough, dry areas such as elbows and knees.
-Not intended for face or neck.

-Avoid eye area.

Ideal for all skin types, it contains rounded granules that won't scratch skin, helps reduce ingrown hairs, and easily lifts the beard.  Skin is left clear, refreshed, and smooth.
column11:
Suggested Usage:-Apply all over clean face.
-Wet skin and gently rub until Scrub turns white.
-Rinse well with warm water.-Build up to daily use.
Precautions:-Avoid eye area.

column8:
What it is: A signature, super-fine loose setting powder that creates a finish so smooth, flaws (and pores) seem to disappear.

What Else You Need to Know: Set and perfect your makeup with this lightweight, airy powder with a skin-hugging formula that makes pores appear to vanish. It effectively absorbs surface oil and has a silky-smooth finish for skin that looks extra-radiant, natural, and fresh.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply after makeup.
-Invert canister and tap gently, allowing powder to gather in tray.
-Dip powder brush in powder, gently tap off excess, and apply.
-For a flawless look, use CLINIQUE's powder-rubdown technique: Pour powder into the palm of your hand, coat your fingertips, gently pat and smooth your fingertips over your skin, and brush off any excess powder.

column8:
What it is: A gel-based formula that defines, lengthens, glosses, and enhances the look of lashes naturally.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: This mascara is ophthalmologist- and allergy-tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start at the base of the lashes, and wiggle the brush up to the tips of the lashes. Repeat this step to build to your desired intensity.
-To apply to the lower lashes, hold the wand vertically.
-Do not pump the brush in the container—this adds air that can dry out the mascara.
-To prevent clumping, let the mascara dry between coats.
-Remove with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover (sold separately).

column8:
What it is:
An extra-gentle eye makeup remover that soothes as it cleanses.

What it is formulated to do:
Clinique's mildest eye makeup remover, this rich, creamy lotion effectively removes all signs of makeup, including long-lasting mascara. As gentle to the eyes as tears, it spreads evenly and quickly, dissolving away makeup without leaving an oily after-feel.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This product is ophthalmologist tested and appropriate for contact lens wearers and all skin types.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use day or night, cleansing one eye area at a time.
-Apply a drop to cotton ball.
-With eye closed, massage gently over lid and lashes.
-Wipe up then down, then open the eye and wipe underneath.
-Tissue off, or rinse off any residue with water.

column8:
What it is:
A highly concentrated oil-free shaving gel.

What it is formulated to do:
This shaving gel instantly transforms into a rich lather. It softens and cushions even the heaviest beards for smooth, close shaves and contains aloe to help calm razor burn.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use daily after cleansing skin.
-Dampen beard area. Lather up a dab between palms and smooth over beard.
-Shave with a fresh, sharp blade following the direction of hair growth.
-Rinse blade frequently under hot, running tap water to avoid razor clogging.
-Rinse well and towel dry.
-Follow with your post-shave formula.

column8:
What it is:
A liquid concealer that helps smooth and minimize the look of fines lines and wrinkles.

What it does:
This moisturizing concealer actually "bridges" fine lines and wrinkles, smoothing and minimizing them for an instantly firmer look. The skin-brightening ingredients help counteract shadows, reduce redness, and give skin more even tone. The long-lasting formula provides moderate, buildable coverage for all skin types.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Ophthalmologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply on bare skin or over foundation.
-Touch on with wand where skin needs line-softening cover. Or, finger-blend into skin using a light, patting motion, or use Concealer Brush.
-To reduce look of facial lines and wrinkles, apply along length of line; smooth across grain of line with Concealer Brush or fingertip. Repeat for more coverage.
-Avoid rubbing once application is complete.

column8:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Oily
✔ Combination

What it is:
A water-based scrub for oily skin.

Solutions for:
- Oiliness
- Pores
- Acne and blemishes

If you want to know more…
This scrub de-flakes skin, unclogs pores, and visibly softens fine lines to help you achieve a clearer and more refreshed complexion.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is allergy tested and free of fragrance, oil, mineral oil, alcohol, talc, silicone, and gluten. It is comprised of 100 percent vegan ingredients.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use morning or night.
-Moisten makeup-free skin with water.
-Using fingertips, massage product onto skin in a circular motion, avoiding the eye area and lips.
-Rinse and follow with the Clinique 3-Step Skin Care System.
-Use as needed, 3-4 times per week.
-Avoid using on active breakout.

column8:
What it is:
A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.

What it does:
This eye and lip makeup remover leaves nothing behind. It effortlessly dissolves long-wearing makeup, even waterproof mascara. This gentle formula is tug-free, non-irritating, and non-stinging.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This eye and lip makeup remover leaves nothing behind. It effortlessly dissolves long-wearing makeup, even waterproof mascara. This gentle formula is tug-free, non-irritating, non-stinging, and oil-free.

BeautyTip:
After using remover, massage Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm onto dry skin, and then follow with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ for smoother, healthier-looking skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake well before using.
-Saturate cotton ball with remover.
-Cleanse one eye area at a time.
-Apply to eye area and hold for several seconds, then wipe with downward strokes.
-Repeat using fresh cotton ball if necessary.
-Use a new saturated cotton ball or tissue for lipstick removal.
-Rinse with cool water.

What it is:
A long-wearing, two-in-one, powder and foundation in a portable compact.

What it does:
Get a powder and foundation combined in one portable compact. The long-wearing, full-coverage powder works as an over-foundation finisher or as a powder foundation. The extra-cling formula provides double coverage, yet leaves the skin with a natural skin-perfecting look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is ideal for combination skin types, is non-acnegenic, dermatologist tested, allergy tested, and is sweat- and humidity-resistant. It’s free of oil, mineral oil, alcohol, gluten, and fragrance.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply after using your 3-Step Skin Care System.
-Smooth on with included sponge applicator.
-Use where needed, or for allover application start in center of face, blending outward with fingertips. For a seamless look, blend well, especially along jaw line.
-Sponge applicator is washable with soap and water; allow to dry completely before next use.

A universally-flattering, ultra-light lip balm in an iconic shade that anyone can wear because it creates a one-of-a-kind lip look on everyone.

What it does:
Not quite a gloss, not quite a lipstick, but more like a balm, this transparent lip balm fuses with the natural tone of your lips to create a lip look that’s unique to you. This sheer, emollient-rich formula glides on for easy layering.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is allergy-tested, and is 100 percent fragrance-free, alcohol-free, silicone-free, mineral-oil-free, and gluten-free.

Suggested Usage:
-Glide on bare lips. Or, for more staying power, prep lips first with All About Lips, then line and fill in lips with your favorite Clinique lip liner.
-Top with lip color, using our Lip Brush for more precise application.

What it is: A cream-mousse cleanser that gently and effectively rinses away makeup.

Skin Type: Combination and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Oiliness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Glycerin and Hyaluronic Acid: Provide a softer, more conditioning cleanse.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This purifying cleanser lathers into a rich foam to rinse away pollution, dirt, excess oil, makeup, and sunscreen quickly, gently, and effectively. It leaves oily skin feeling fresh and clean with a non-drying, non-stripping formula.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Lather between palms with lukewarm water.
-Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area.
-Rinse off.
-Follow with Clarifying Lotion to clear the way for smoother, brighter-looking skin.

Recycling Instructions:
-Same great formula, now in more sustainable packaging. Tube is minimum 39 percent post-consumer recycled material and 28 percent plant-derived plastic. Cap is 25 percent post-consumer recycled material.
-What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.​
-What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.

Cap is 25 percent post-consumer recycled material.-What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.​-What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.

column8:
What it is:
An eye makeup remover that acts fast.

What it is formulated to do:
This unique formula quickly removes all eye makeup, from lashes to brows. Perfect for quick makeup changes, touchups, and repairs, it cleans easily without disturbing other makeup. Blur-free and sting-free, this ophthalmologist-tested product is non-irritating and oil-free. It requires no rubbing and is ideal for all skin types.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Moisten cotton ball with Rinse-Off Eye Makeup Solvent or use a cotton swab for spot work.
-Sweep over eye makeup.
-Tissue off or rinse with water.

column8:
What it is:
A rich lip liner that defines with ease—no sharpening required.

What it does:
This all-day liner traces the lips while preventing lipstick from feathering and bleeding. Or cover the entire surface of lips to extend the wear of lipstick. This non-drying formula is water- and transfer-resistant.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Swivel up applicator to expose only 1/8" of product (the pencil does not retract to avoid drying out the formula).
-Follow "dot-dot-dash" method: Draw two dots on upper lip's bow, a dash across bottom of lower lip, then connect all three.
-To extend the wear of lip color, fill in lips with liner, then follow with lipstick.
-Recap securely to protect formula.

column8:
What it is:
A silky pencil liner with no sharpening required.

What it does:
This automatic eye liner pencil twists up and glides on to line and define with ease. It smudges to a smooth blur of color with the convenient smudge tool on the opposite end. It needs no sharpening and the silky, transfer-resistant formula is always ready and stays on all day.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Ophthalmologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Swivel up only 1/8- inch (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying).
-Line eyes.
-Use the smudging tool on the opposite end to gently smudge color to desired effect.
-Allow color to set for 60 seconds to ensure transfer-resistance.
-Recap securely after using to protect the silky formula.
-Can be used alone or over eyeshadow.

What it is: A lip-smoothing treatment that hydrates, softens, and helps prevent lipstick feathering.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

What Else You Need to Know: This lip treatment delivers both immediate and long-term results to minimize evidence of fine lines, giving the lip area a smoother look and feel. It also visibly de-flakes lips, helping color glide on while also helping it wear longer.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use after last skincare product prior to makeup application.
-Apply small dab to skin around and on lips.
-Allow to absorb thoroughly before applying lip color.
-Reapply throughout the day as needed.
-Wear under lipstick or alone.

-Please Note: CLINIQUE is phasing in updated packaging for this product.

What it is:
A soothing after-shave treatment for all skin types.

What it is formulated to do:
This light, comforting after-shave treatment encourages the healing of minor nicks and cuts. Formulated with aloe, it helps to calm razor burn and relieve dryness. Skin is left feeling refreshed.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use daily on beard area, immediately after shaving.
-Pour a dime-size amount onto palm; smooth evenly onto just-shaved skin.
-Follow with M Lotion or M Gel-Lotion on dry areas only.

Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
An award-winning, lightweight eye cream-gel that diminishes the appearance of eye puffiness, darkness, and fine lines.

Solutions for:
- Puffiness
- Dark circles
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
This nourishing cream-gel formulation brightens dark circles and sends puffiness packing while actually helping to hold eye makeup in place. It refreshes and brightens eye area and is recommended for use morning and night, both under eyes and on lids.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is allergy tested, ophthalmologist tested, non-acnegenic, and free of fragrance, alcohol, SLS, talc, mineral oil, and oil.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use morning and night after Clinique's 3-Step Skin Care system.
-With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight, oil-free hydrating lotion for normal to oily skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Step 3 in Clinique's 3-Step Skin Care System for men, this lightweight lotion delivers oil-free hydration. It improves the overall condition of skin, helps soothe shaving irritation, and leaves skin feeling smooth and comfortable.

What else you need to know:
This product is ideal for all skin types.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply morning and evening, after using the appropriate Scruffing Lotion.
-Smooth on clean, exfoliated skin wherever it feels dry.

column8:
What it is:
A lash-thickening mascara for bigger, better lashes.

What it does:
This mascara magnifies lashes to twice their size. The transfer-resistant formula thickens and the unique tapered brush grabs every lash.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is ophthalmologist tested. It is free of SLS, mineral oil, alcohol, gluten, and oil. It is also 100 percent fragrance-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start at the base of lashes and wiggle brush up to the tip of lashes.
-Use tapered tip of brush to separate and define. Repeat to build.
-To apply to lower lashes, hold wand vertically.
-Do not pump brush in container?this adds air that can dry out the mascara.
-To prevent clumping, let mascara dry between coats.
column10: What it is:A lash-thickening mascara for bigger, better lashes.What it does:This mascara magnifies lashes to twice their size. The transfer-resistant formula thickens and the unique tapered brush grabs every lash. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This product is ophthalmologist tested. It is free of SLS, mineral oil, alcohol, gluten, and oil. It is also 100 percent fragrance-free.
column11: Suggested Usage:-Start at the base of lashes and wiggle brush up to the tip of lashes.-Use tapered tip of brush to separate and define. Repeat to build.-To apply to lower lashes, hold wand vertically.-Do not pump brush in container?this adds air that can dry out the mascara.-To prevent clumping, let mascara dry between coats.

What it is: A lash-conditioning undercoat that enhances the benefits of other Clinique mascaras, moisturizes, and helps to condition dry lashes.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. This product is also vegan and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Lash Building Primer is ophthalmologist-tested.

Please note: Lash Building Primer is not recommended for use with Lash Power Mascara, High Impact Curling Mascara, or Bottom Lash Mascara (each sold separately).
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply Lash Building Primer generously to your lashes, using an upward motion.
-Immediately follow with mascara (sold separately).
-Remove products with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover (sold separately).

Precautions:
-Please note: Lash Building Primer is not recommended for use with Lash Power Mascara, High Impact Curling Mascara, or Bottom Lash Mascara (each sold separately).

column8:
What it is: A dermatologist-developed liquid exfoliating lotion that clears the way for smoother, brighter-looking skin.

Skin Type: Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Oiliness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Witch Hazel: Visibly refines skin.
- Salicylic Acid: Helps exfoliate the surface of the skin and enhance cell turnover.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This gentle, refreshing formula is the difference maker for healthy skin. It sweeps away pollution, grime, and dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin. Clarifying Lotion 4’s exfoliating preps skin for moisturizer, making it more receptive to hydration and treatment products. For oilier skin, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimize excess oil and keep pores clear. For drier skin, twice-daily exfoliation helps remove surface flakes that can be a barrier to moisture absorption. It even helps the look of fine, dry lines disappear.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.
-For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.
-Follow with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, Gel or Jelly (sold separately).

-For best results, use after Liquid Facial Soap (sold separately) and Clarifying Lotion (sold separately).

column8:
What it is:
A richly-pigmented, volumizing mascara that instantly lengthens and defines each and every lash.

What it does:
Get instant lash drama with High Impact™ Mascara. Pump up the volume and length of your lashes for a look that appears lusher, plusher, and bolder. This mascara coats your lashes in pure, deep color for an irresistible lash look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is ophthalmologist tested, allergy-tested, and is safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. It is free of mineral oil and fragrance.

BeautyTip:
For brighter eyes, apply Pep Start Eye Cream before mascara application, then take it all off with Take the Day Off Makeup Remover (each sold separately).
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start at the base of lashes and wiggle brush up to the tip of lashes.
-Repeat to build.
-To apply to lower lashes, hold wand vertically.
-Do not pump brush in container. This adds air that can dry out the mascara.
-To prevent clumping, let mascara dry in between coats.

column8:
What it is:
A creamy, light concealer that brushes on to brighten, perfect, and soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

What it does:
This sheer-coverage concealer softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles and contains light-diffusing optics that brighten shadows. The creamy, oil-free formula flows through the unique brush applicator for a smooth, precise application.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Ophthalmologist tested. Non-acnegenic.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply on bare skin or over foundation.
-Touch on with brush where skin needs brightening cover: inner and outer corners of eye, sides of nose, etc. Or, finger-blend into skin using a light, patting motion.
-Build coverage by adding more when needed.
-Avoid rubbing once application is complete.
-Note: The first application usually requires several full turns to initially dispense product on the brush applicator. Subsequent applications require only 4 to 5 clicks, not full turns.

column8:
What it is: A two-in-one face scrub and mask that buffs and hydrates with real brown sugar and strawberries.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Scrub

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Brown Sugar: A natural humectant that seals in moisture, gently buffs away dry, dull skin.
- Real Wild Strawberries: Packed with vitamin C to help to brighten and soothe.
- Plum Seed Oil and Grapeseed Oil: Notable for their hydrating and nourishing properties.

What Else You Need to Know: Looking for an exfoliator that isn't harsh or drying? This is it. The brown sugar crystals and strawberry seeds remove rough patches and then dissolve in the nourishing oils, leaving your skin velvety soft and smooth long after you wash it off. Plus, the sweet citrus scent smells good enough to eat.

Clinical Results: In-vivo test:
- 97% reported improved skin texture and softer, more supple ski
- 94% felt it had an exfoliating effect and decreased rough patches
- 88% noticed soothed skin that felt silky and velvety
- 85% said their skin was radiant

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, apply a generous amount to damp skin and gently massage using circular motions.
-Let it work for five to 10 minutes and rinse with warm water.
-Can be used three to four times a week.

What it is: An instant hydrating mask with real rose petals suspended in a silky gel that gently soothes and tones with a plumping effect.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Dullness/Uneven Texture

Formulation: Lightweight Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Pure Rosewater: Soothes and tones.
- Cucumber Extract and Aloe Vera Gel: Help soothe the skin and have an immediate cooling and calming effect.
- Porphyridium Cruentum: A "smart" algae, it delivers optimum moisture.

What Else You Need to Know: This fresh classic face mask drenches skin with rosewater, cucumber extract, and aloe vera gel to instantly cool and calm, while a blend of teas helps to brighten. Porphyridium cruentum, a hydrating microalgae extract, maintains moisture levels for soft, supple skin. Plus, it smells like fresh roses.

Clinical Results: In-vivo test:
- 100% reported healthy-looking, supple skin
- 93% felt their skin was moisturized, softened, smoothed, and soothed
- 93% noticed a cooling and calming sensation
- 90% said it nourished and visibly improved the appearance of their skin

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, apply a generous amount to damp skin, avoiding the eye area.
-Leave on for five to 10 minutes and rinse.
-Love it so much you want to do it every day? Go ahead—it's gentle enough for daily use.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Citrus and Fruits

Key Notes: Citrus, Apple, Bamboo

Fragrance Description: This colorful, fresh, floral fruity Eau de Toilette reflects the sensuality of the Mediterranean lifestyle. Sicilian cedar combines with the freshness of the green apple and the floral allure and spontaneity of the bluebell, the top note captures the essence of a sunny South Italian summer.

About the bottle:
A timeless design inspired by the classic Dolce & Gabbana parfum, Light Blue shape is confident but always very feminine. Its light blue cap evokes the clear skies of the Mediterranean. The bottle itself is strong, reflecting today's modern woman.

About the Fragrance:
Feminine and resolute, the freshness of bamboo softens with a feminine bouquet of jasmine and white rose.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

Key Notes: Marine Notes, Bergamot, Cedarwood

Fragrance Description: This cologne opens with a splash of marine notes including Calabrian bergamot, neroli, and green tangerine. The aquatic nuances mix with rosemary, persimmon, and Indonesian patchouli, creating an aroma that is fresh, clean, and relaxed.

About the Bottle: The luxe, clear matte bottle echoes the clean-water-inspired fragrance within.

About the Fragrance: Classic and perfectly balanced, this aquatic men's cologne captures the pure freshness and warmth of the Mediterranean Sea with expertly blended fragrance oils.

column8:
What it is:
A multitasking formula to gently yet thoroughly cleanse face, body, and hair—enriched with moisturizing wheat protein and panthenol.

What it is formulated to do:
All-Over Wash For Face, Hair & Body provides a luxuriously, foaming lather to remove sweat and dirt, without stripping away natural oils that keep skin and hair healthy. Gentle enough for all skin types, wheat protein and panthenol provide water-binding properties that help maintain essential moisture.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested and free of alcohol and colorants.

column8:
What it is:
This all-in-one, revolutionary shave formula is a pre-shave oil, shave cream, and skin conditioner.

What it is formulated to do:
The lightweight, lubricating lotion penetrates whiskers to soften even the toughest beard, while macadamia nut oil and jojoba oil penetrate below the surface of the skin to soften new whisker growth and minimize irritation. The result is a remarkably easy shave, soft skin, and no razor burn.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
The unique transparent formula lets you to see where you are shaving, for less risk of nicks and cuts—especially important for guys with goatees, mustaches, or sideburns. It's dermatologist tested and is free of fragrance, alcohol, and colorant.

What it is:
An antiaging rollerball that cools and massages the delicate eye area.

Solutions for:
- Puffiness
- Dark circles
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
The Eye Balm De-Puffing & Cooling Gel features a stainless steel rollerball applicator and clear hydrating gel to de-puff, energize, and refresh the look of tired eyes. Infused with grape seed and chamomile extracts, panthenol, and vitamins A, C, and E, this brightening balm reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while providing weightless hydration for vibrant eyes.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested, cruelty-free, fragrance-free, and colorant-free. It is made in the USA.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Roll directly onto the undereye area, avoiding the eyelids.

Precautions:
-Avoid direct contact with eyes.
-If direct eye contact occurs, rinse with water.

column8:
What it is:
A deep cleaning, pre-shave cleanser and scrub in one.

What it is formulated to do:
This scrub clears the way for an easier, closer shave by smoothing the surface of the skin and clearing congested pores. Menthol and vitamin C help wake-up and invigorate skin while small, highly uniform scrubbing particles open congested pores and sweep away deep-down oil, dirt and dead skin cells. Why bother? Because removing oil, dirt and dead cells helps the razor get closer to the skin for a smoother, easier shave. Getting rid of those dead cells also helps prevent in-grown hairs.

What else you need to know:
Regular exfoliation (gently scrubbing off old skin cells) also improves skin's appearance and radiance by exposing newer, younger cells beneath the surface. The scrub is dermatologist-tested, colorant-, alcohol-, and paraben-free.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight, oil-free, antiaging treatment that improves visible signs of aging.

What it is formulated to do:
Jack Black’s Line Smoother Oil-Free Moisturizer improves texture and helps even out minor skin discolorations, leaving skin smoother and younger-looking. Natural fruit acids—eight percent glycolic acid, a natural acid found in sugar cane—help minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by sloughing off the top layer of dead skin cells, revealing softer skin hidden beneath the surface. The quick-absorbing formula provides intense yet lightweight moisturization with no lingering greasy feel.

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested and free of alcohol, fragrance, and colorants.

column8:
What it is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Ingredient Callouts: Free of phthalates. This product is also vegan.

What Else You Need to Know: This makeup remover effortlessly dissolves even the most tenacious makeup and sunscreen. Its non-greasy, non-drying, lightweight formula nourishes skin, cleanses thoroughly, and rinses off completely, so all that’s left is a fresh, visible, dewy glow. It’s great for sensitive skin, too.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Suggested Usage:
-Use fingertips to massage balm over dry skin.
-Rinse well with warm water.
-Pat dry.
-Follow with your CLINIQUE 3-Step Skin Care System.

What it is:
A hybrid shadow that's smooth like a cream, blendable like a liquid, and finishes like a powder.

What it does:
This modern hybrid formula combines the smoothness of a cream, the blendability of a liquid, and the finish of a powder with long-wearing color and prismatic reflections. Its creamy, silky, near-fluid formula creates luminous, well-defined eye looks in finishes from sheer, crystallized light to stunning metallic.

The long-wearing formula lasts for up to six hours of crease-proof, fade-proof, flake-proof, stay-true color. It is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested, safe for contact lens wearers, non-acnegenic, and suitable for all skin types. It can be used wet or dry.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to lid using your fingers, a brush, or a sponge.

column8:
What it is: An award-winning Bronzing Powder that creates all-over warmth and a long-wearing natural-looking glow.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: NARS’ award-winning Bronzing Powder creates the ultimate healthy-looking glow. Diffused bronzing powders with subtle golden sheen create all-over warmth. It can be used to contour, create, or enhance the look of tanned skin. Each shade delivers soft, natural-looking color for a sun-kissed glow.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-To warm skin, sweep onto skin starting from the temple, go across the cheek, then along the jaw line.
-Take what’s left on the brush and blend into the neck and décolleté to prevent lines of demarcation.
-Apply in a circular motion, continuously buffing and blending, to avoid creating harsh lines.

column8:
What it is:
A unique purifying soak comprised of pure sake to detoxify, soften, and even skin tone.

What it does:
Inspired by the Japanese Geisha bathing ritual of perfuming baths with real peaches, this Fresh Rice Sake Bath includes an infusion of exquisite fruit and 38% real sake for an unparalleled sensorial experience. This delicately foaming, therapeutic soak increases circulation and body temperature, inducing a purifying sweat to eliminate toxins. Sake also contains enzymes that hydrate and smooth the skin's appearance. It is further enriched with pine extract, which promotes easy breathing and pure ginger to render muscles pliable and relaxed.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Sulfates
- Synthetic Dyes
- Phthalates
- GMOs
- Triclosan

What else you need to know:
"For centuries, Japanese Geisha have used sake and rice to exfoliate the face, detoxify the body, and regenerate and smooth the skin. To keep our bathing ritual authentic, we incorporated pure sake into this unbelievably detoxifying formula." —Alina Roytberg, Fresh Co-founder
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Soak for at least 10 minutes.
-Rinse body under a cool shower without using soap.
-Gently towel dry.
-For ideal results, follow with Rice Dry Oil.

column8:
What it is: A nurturing eyelash primer that maximizes mascara results for major lash lift and the appearance of longer, thicker, and more volumized lashes.

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin E: Conditions eyelashes.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: This iconic lash primer evenly separates and coats eyelashes with a nourishing, conditioning formula to maximize the results of your mascara. Infused with micro-fibers and vitamin E, this eyelash primer helps improve natural lash length, thickness, and curl over time for a false lash effect.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Clinical Results: In a consumer test with a panel of 103 women using CILS BOOSTER and their regular mascara:
- 93% saw more length
- 92% saw more volume
- 85% saw more curl
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply the Cils Booster XL as a mascara base from root to tip.
-Immediately Apply mascara over the wet lash primer.
-Do not wait until it is dried before coating each lash with mascara for a perfectly-smooth, clump-free application and lash look.
-Tip: May be applied at night as an eyelash conditioner.
