What it is: A hydrating lip balm infused with a blend of antioxidants to nourish and protect lips.

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Monoï Hydrating Complex: Provides long-lasting hydration for smooth, supple comfort.
- Blend of Antioxidants: Provides daily protection against environmental aggressors.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: Total temptation meets sheer sensation. Indulge lips with Afterglow Lip Balm’s inviting shine and hint of tint. Formulated with Monoï Hydrating Complex for smooth, supple comfort, and a blend of antioxidants to help protect lips. The Clean Cut shade contains SPF 10 for essential sun protection.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply any shade of Afterglow Lip Balm to bare lips for a sheer wash of color or as a moisturizing base under any lip shade.
-To add shine and subtle illuminating effects, apply as a topcoat over other lip colors.
-To add a veil of golden shimmer to the lip, tap illuminating Loose Powder (sold separately) over Afterglow Lip Balm.
-Tap Afterglow Lip Balm onto the high points of the cheeks with your fingertips for a natural-looking, shimmer-free highlight.

column8:
Coverage:
✔ Full

Skin type:
✔ Combination
✔ Oily

Finish:
✔ Matte

What it is:
An oil-free, 10-hour wear, lasting foundation that remains comfortable on skin.

What it does:
Creates a flawless, comfortable canvas that lasts up to 12 hours. Get Silk Crème Oil Free Photo Edition Foundation, Laura Mercier's fullest coverage foundation. It smooths skin and visibly evens the look of your skin tone. The high-pigment formula blends seamlessly, hiding even hard-to-cover imperfections for a natural-looking, matte finish that’s ideal for photos, videos, and special events—as well as everyday wear. Its color-true pigments virtually disappear on your skin for a smooth, even application and blending.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
"A woman should feel flawless every day, whether she is dropping her kids off at school or getting ready for a black tie event. If you’re seeking an Oil Free formula with a natural matte finish, Silk Crème Oil Free Photo Edition Foundation will give you the confidence of a photo-ready, flawless finish—whatever the occasion."—Laura Mercier

Renowned makeup artist Laura Mercier believes that Foundation's true purpose is to even out your skin tone so it looks its very best. Her foundations create a flawless, natural look that lets your skin show through, yet they are distinctly lighter in weight and texture. The aim is to enhance your beauty, not cover it up.

This professional-quality foundation is noncomedogenic, dermatologist-tested, and free of sodium laurel.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake well, then dispense a small amount onto the back of your hand and apply to face with Laura Mercier Egg-Shaped Sponge or fingertips. For best results, use after your preferred Laura Mercier Foundation Primer.

For the most flawless, natural look:
-Avoid over-applying foundation to the middle of the face—where too much formula can accentuate lines and other imperfections.
-Start at the outer portion of the face and working inward towards the nose.
-Focus on one area at a time and be sure to blend well, especially below the jaw line.
-Avoid excess application around eyes or the contours of the face. Repeat application until desired coverage is achieved.

column16: Rose Ivory - very fair with cool undertones

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Fruity Floral

Key Notes: Dark Berries, Jasmine, Musk-Amber

Fragrance Description: This fragrance is a floral fresh perfume with gentle top notes of rose and honeysuckle and a deep heart of tiare flower, jasmine, and peony. It also contains solar notes of sandalwood, musk, and patchouli add subtle warmth for a classic elegance created for the woman who knows and loves London with all its quirks and contradictions.

About the Bottle: The iconic Burberry check fabric wrapped around the glass bottle merges fragrance and fashion.

About the Fragrance: This scent is a modern, yet elegant scent which captures and celebrates the city of London and its distinctive style.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is: A liquid facial soap that cleanses with a soft, non-drying lather.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Oiliness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Sucrose: Calms and soothes.
- Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin: Provide a softer, more conditioning cleanse.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This liquid facial soap cleanses with a soft, non-drying lather to loosen surface flakes, removes dirt and debris, and protects skin’s natural moisture balance. The quick-rinsing formula leaves skin clean, comfortable, refreshed, and never taut or dry. It also preps skin for the exfoliating action of Step Two, Clarifying Lotion.

Clinique’s formulas: No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin.
Clinique’s packaging: Same great formula, now in more sustainable packaging. Bottle is 96 percent plant-derived plastic. Cap is 25 percent post-consumer recycled material.
• What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.
• What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.​

Please note: In an effort to minimize waste, Clinique’s first selling through all of its cleansers with the original packaging. That's why you might not receive the newest packaging, but rest assured it’s the same great formula inside. ​
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Lather between palms with lukewarm water.
-Massage over makeup-free face and neck.
-Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.
-Follow with Steps 2 and 3: Clarifying Lotion (sold separately) and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ (sold separately), Gel (sold separately) or Hydrating Jelly (sold separately).

Recycling Instructions:
-This bottle is widely recyclable.
-Rinse the bottle, reattach the cap, then place in a recycling bin. ​

column2: pores no more® pore refiner primer
column6:
-Oil-Absorbing Spheres: Mattify skin and diffuse light to minimize the appearance of pores, expression lines, and wrinkles.
-Red Clover Flower Extract: Helps shrink the look of pores over time by rebalancing skin conditions responsible for pore enlargement.
-Derivative of Salicylic Acid: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells and oil build-up within pores, smooths the look of the skin’s surface, and calms skin.

Cyclopentasiloxane, Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Lauryl Peg/Ppg-18/18 Methicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polysilicone-11, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Dimethyl Isosorbide, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Phenoxyethanol, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Isopentyldiol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethyl Oxobenzo Dioxasilane, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Laureth-12, Iron Oxide (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499).

column8:
What it is: A two-in-one pore refiner and makeup primer that helps diminish the look of pores and imperfections, mattifies the skin, and creates a smooth canvas.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores and Oiliness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Oil-Absorbing Spheres: Mattify skin and diffuse light to minimize the appearance of pores, expression lines, and wrinkles.
- Red Clover Flower Extract: Helps shrink the look of pores over time by rebalancing skin conditions responsible for pore enlargement.
- Derivative of Salicylic Acid: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells and oil build-up within pores, smooths the look of skin’s surface, and calms skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This primer is shown to keep skin shine-free with pore-refining ingredients including red clover flower extract that works to shrink the look of pores and a soothing derivative of salicylic acid that gently exfoliates away dead skin cells and oil build-up for a smooth canvas. Dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic.

Clinical Results: In an instrumental evaluation conducted on 30 volunteers:
- 40% reduction in skin oiliness after 1 application
- 100% showed a decrease in the appearance of pore size after 1 application
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use in the morning after your moisturizer to refine the look of pores, lines, and imperfections.
-Use before makeup as a primer and re-apply over makeup throughout the day, as necessary.
-Can be worn alone for a natural look or under makeup to instantly absorb excess sebum and erase shine.

column8:
What it is:
A package of gentle exfoliating peel pads for calm, comfortable skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Chronic stress can impair skin's ability to maintain moisture, leaving it flaky, broken-out, or lackluster. Exceedingly effective and remarkably gentle, Nordic Skin Peel pads quickly brighten and renew the skin's surface. These double-duty pads help remove dry, dehydrated surface skin cells while a soothing antibacterial helps keep pores clean. Antioxidants and botanicals protect, soothe, and calm irritated skin.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, smooth pad over entire face once daily.
Use three to five times per week for sensitive skin.
-Follow with sunscreen.

Precautions:
-Avoid eye area.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Warm Florals

Key Notes: Ginger, Orange Blossom, Vanilla

Fragrance Description: Fresh, feminine, and seductive, this signature eau de parfum blends blood orange, ginger, and pear sorbet. The zesty notes are softened by hints of floral sambac jasmine, orange blossom, and lavender honey warmed with woody fragrance oils and a vanilla base.

About the Bottle: A feminine take on the cult-classic men's fragrance, the luxe bottle has an unmistakable elongated silhouette.

About the Fragrance: Addictive, intoxicating, and passionate, Armani Code Pour Femme captures the intimacy and excitement of an unforgettable new encounter. The citrusy, floral fragrance opens with a sensual orange-flower note intertwined with a fresh ginger accent, giving way to a slow, honey-sandalwood caress.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is:
A long-wearing, blendable cream eyeshadow that can be worn alone or with other products.

What it does:
This highly-pigmented, long-wearing eyeshadow goes on creamy and dries to an intense, vibrant finish. The innovative, second-skin-like formula blends smoothly over lids and creates seamless, buildable coverage without looking heavy or cakey. Its superior color purity stays true for up to 15 hours, and will not streak, crease, or flake. Pro Longwear Paint Pot can be mixed with other products like MAC shadows and liners (sold separately).

This flexible, water-resistant formula is ophthalmologist- and dermatologist-tested, and is non-acnegenic.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Smooth over eye area with your finger or a brush.

What it is:
An expertly-edited contouring palette with six shades to sculpt and enhance features.

What it does:
This expertly-edited palette contains three matte contouring powders and three subtly-shimmery highlighting powders to sculpt, shape, and enhance your facial features. Each highlighting shade contains soft-focus technology to softly reflect light while the contouring colors provide sheer coverage to create natural-looking shadows. The effect is maximum impact with minimal texture.

What else you need to know:
These shades provide smooth, even, silky application with a formula soothes and conditions skin. This product is suitable for all skin types, dermatologist-tested, and non-acnegenic.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to the face using a brush, as desired.

column6:
-Aqueous Emulsion of Volatile Oils with Optimized Pigment Cover: Aid in "fixing" the product to the skin with a matte finish.
-Plastic Polymers: Creates a thin, water-resistant layer that resists humidity.
-Allantoin: An active ingredient with healing and regenerative properties.
-Microcrystalline Cellulose Powder: Ensures a uniform, even application and controls excess oils.
-Serma Sensitive: An anti-inflammatory agent.

column8:
What it is: A long-lasting, oil-free, waterproof concealer that provides a full-coverage, matte finish.

Coverage: Full

Finish: Matte

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

What Else You Need to Know: Designed to cover blemishes, discoloration, scars and tattoos, this creamy, full-coverage concealer contains a high concentration of pigments and waterproof technology to ensure long-wearing coverage on the face and body. Oil-controlling powders work to hide imperfections evenly and effectively.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Prime skin with a non-oily moisturizing cream to ensure long wear.
-Using your fingers or Artisan Brush 174 (sold separately), lightly dab a small amount where desired.
-Blend the edges to avoid demarcation lines.
-Set by applying Super Matte Loose Powder (sold separately) with a powder puff or Artisan Brush 130 (sold separately).
-Apply in thin layers, if needed, to build coverage.
-This formula tends to darken as it dries, so choose a color two shades lighter than your natural skin tone for best results.

An antioxidant-rich, moisturizing cream for the hands and nails that provides a silky finish and lasting comfort.

If you want to know more…
Concentrated with moisturizing active ingredients plus antioxidant grape polyphenols and reparative organic fair trade shea butter, this Hand and Nail Cream leaves skin soft and nourished. Its delicately perfumed, rich texture is instantly absorbed into skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, does not contain animal ingredients, and is not tested on animals.

Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight mattifying spray that refreshes skin while instantly controlling shine on the surface without disturbing makeup.

What it does:
The innovative formula contains powders, silica, and other oil-absorbing agents to help set makeup, rebalance and mattify skin. This product instantly soothes and refreshes skin, reducing the appearance of pores and sets makeup without hindering wear.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested, ophthalmologist tested, and non-acnegenic. It is suitable for all skin types.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Hold bottle 12 inches away from face and spray evenly.
-Use alone or to finish makeup.
-For face products, apply your favorite powder foundation and lightly mist all over face to set and hydrate.
-For color products, apply your favorite eye shadow or pigment to your preferred brush, lightly mist bristles and sweep across lids for an intensified shadow look.

An alcohol-free, pH balanced freshener that gently tones, refines, and softens skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Soothing and cooling, this pH balanced freshener gently tones and refines skin without depleting the natural oils of normal/combination skin. What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested.

What it is:
A magnetic, on-the-go blotting powder brush that conveniently attaches to the bottom of its touch-up partner, Invisimatte Blotting Powder, for an instant filter effect.

What it does:
Touch up with the ultimate on-the-go blotting powder brush. Custom-made to pair with Invisimatte Blotting Powder, the Portable Touch Up Brush has a retractable design and magnetic panel, so it snaps right in to the bottom of the powder compact. Slanted, soft synthetic bristles provide extra surface area for applying Invisimatte Blotting Powder—perfect for quick fixes and a mattifying, instant-filter effect.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Rihanna wanted to create a portable touch-up brush that magnetizes right in the blotting powder compact, fitting neatly into your handbag or clutch.

Fenty Beauty is 100% cruelty free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Dab gently with Invisimatte Blotting Powder to absorb shine, focusing on the T-zone, cheeks, chin, and around the nose.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy

Scent Type: Woody Spices

Key Notes: Bergamot, Mimosa Flower, Tobacco Leaves

Fragrance Description: This sophisticated cologne features top notes of bergamot, lavender, and warm cinnamon, artfully balanced with heart notes of mimosa flower and rich leather. Lower tones combine tobacco leaves and oak moss for a deep, elegant, and stylish cologne which celebrates the city of London and its distinctive style.

About the Bottle: The glass bottle is wrapped in iconic BURBERRY check fabric, echoing the idea that London customers are drawn to fine tailoring fabrics.

About the Fragrance: This fragrance was created for a modern English gentleman who appreciates fine tailoring— from bespoke suits to classic chesterfield coats. It‘s a fougère, spicy scent with a sartorial elegance. The base note of opoponax, has a warm-balsamic, honey-like aroma, a component of incense and perfumes for centuries.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is:
A quickly absorbed indulgent body oil formulated with more than 50 percent almond oil to help skin feel firmer, smoothed, and hydrated.

What it is formulated to do:
Reveal a satiny-smooth body with one of L’Occitane’s cult favorites. Thanks to more than 50 percent almond oil, naturally rich in omega 6, and camelina oil, rich in omega 3, the Almond Smoothing and Beautifying Supple Skin Oil helps skin feel nourished and more supple. Its luxurious texture melts into the skin and leaves it with a subtle scent of fresh almonds. Hydrated for up to 48 hours, skin is as soft as satin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Almonds are an incredibly delicate fruit to grow: the best almonds require cool air without ever freezing. L'Occitane almonds are sourced from a very special region in Haute Provence, where giant windmills circulate air to create an environment for some of the most delicious and nutritious almonds to grow. L'Occitane supports the sustainability of almond trees in the region, as these trees—while difficult to grow—are a staple to the beauty of the Provencal landscape.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply with a spray, massaging into the skin with upward circular motions.
-Focus on zones concerned by skin slackening (thighs, buttocks, tummy, and arms).
-Perfect to mix with loose bronzing powder.

column8:
What it is: A modern, shine-controlling foundation that provides a natural-matte finish and medium-to-full, buildable coverage.

Coverage: Full

Finish: Matte

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

SPF: SPF 15


What Else You Need to Know: M·A·C put Studio Fix Fluid SPF 15 to the ultimate test of seeing how long it wears and, not surprisingly, the formula lasts for up to a full 24 hours. This modern foundation combines a matte finish and medium-to-full, buildable coverage with broad-spectrum SPF 15 protection. Applies, builds, and blends easily and evenly while controlling shine with a non-caking, breathable formula. Comfortable and extremely long-wearing, it helps minimize the appearance of pores and imperfections, giving skin a smoother and more even look and finish. Available in M·A·C’ most inclusive range of colors.

Added benefits:
- 24-hour wear
- Reduces appearance of pores
- Controls oil and shine for up to 6 hours
- For all skin types, especially oily skin
- Stay-true color for up to 24 hours
- Non-streaking/caking/settling/creasing for up to 24 hours
- Provides immediate and long-term moisture for up to 8 hours
- Sweat- and humidity-resistant
- Oil-free
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Always apply to well-moisturized and prepped skin, using the 170 Synthetic Rounded Slant Brush for a studio-ready complexion.
-Apply to the center of the face first (or wherever you want more coverage), then use a brush to blend to the outer regions of your face.
-Tip: Try mixing with your favorite moisturizer or oils to create a more sheer, luminous finish.

column8:
What it is:
A multitasking makeup remover for sensitive eyes that removes the most stubborn waterproof makeup in one swipe.

What it does:
This ultra-gentle makeup remover instantly wipes away impurities and makeup. Creamy and lightweight, it easily wipes away any waterproof makeup that other cleansers leave behind. It leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed without any greasy residue. Formulated with honey extract, this powerful yet soft formula moisturizes and soothes delicate skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This product is safe for sensitive eyes and even contact lens wearers. It is safe to use on synthetic and natural false lashes to ensure maximum wear. It is free of fragrance and dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Makeup Removal:
-Soak a cotton pad in Sens' Eyes and place on a closed eyelid.
-Once it has soaked into the lashes, gently wipe away any makeup.
-For instant touch ups and fixing make up mistakes, soak a cotton swab in Sens' Eyes and dab away makeup imperfections.
-Professional tip: for perfectly cleansed lids, run a cotton swab over the base of the eyelashes to remove any residue.

To care for false lashes:
-Soak a mascara wand in Sens' Eyes and comb through your natural or synthetic lash to remove and clean excess glue, mascara, or eyeliner.

column8:
What it is:
A dual-purpose liquid cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser works gently without over-drying to leave your complexion clean, hydrated, and fresh. Witch hazel acts as an astringent, toner, anti-irritant, and antioxidant. Oat- and coconut-derived, sulfate-free surfactants effectively cleanse the skin, while certified organic sage leaf and rosemary provide antibacterial benefits. Certified organic chamomile and aloe leaf help soothe and reduce redness. This product will work into a rich lather to gently and effectively remove dirt and debris without irritation or dryness. The result is clean, clear, smooth skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:

column10:
What it is:
A dual-purpose liquid cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin. 

What it is formulated to do:
Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser works gently without over-drying to leave your complexion clean, hydrated, and fresh. Witch hazel acts as an astringent, toner, anti-irritant, and antioxidant. Oat- and coconut-derived, sulfate-free surfactants effectively cleanse the skin, while certified organic sage leaf and rosemary provide antibacterial benefits. Certified organic chamomile and aloe leaf help soothe and reduce redness. This product will work into a rich lather to gently and effectively remove dirt and debris without irritation or dryness. The result is clean, clear, smooth skin. 

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 PureScience formulas lock in nature’s bestnatural surfactants and certified organic ingredientsto please even the most sensitive skin. This dermatologist tested product contains no artificial fragrance or colorants.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Florals

Key Notes: Mandarin, Lily of the Valley, Sheer Woods

Fragrance Description: With faint notes of Lily of the Valley and mandarin orange, this captures that bright feeling of touchable bare skin immediately after a refreshing shower.

About the Bottle: CLEAN cares about the health of the planet. Working with vendors who use green manufacturing processes and minimizing the amount of waste produced by the packaging is of paramount importance. The glass bottle is recyclable, and the carton is made from FSC certified paper printed with non-toxic soy and water-based inks. The corn derived cellophane is biodegradable and compostable.

About the Fragrance: Shower Fresh is inspired by the sense of rejuvenation that comes after a relaxing shower. CLEAN CLASSIC is a collection of simple, trusted and conscious perfumes. Casual and light, these linear fragrances allow the scent to remain intact throughout the day and are perfectly suited for layering.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry

What it is:
A set of powerful eye masks that hydrate, brightens the appearance of dark circles, and smooths the appearance of fine lines in as little as 15 minutes.

Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Dark circles

If you want to know more…
State-of-the-art micro-infusion technology developed in Japan delivers liquid retinol, a pure form of vitamin A, to support cell turnover and soften the appearance of wrinkles and crow’s feet. Saturated with chlorella, mukurossi, and gambir extracts that helps prevent the appearance of wrinkles and collagen-supporting hydroxyproline, these stretchy cotton masks conform perfectly to the eye contour without slipping to provide visible results. Super bio-hyaluronic acid N visibly plumps sensitive skin with much-needed moisture for eyes that look instantly refreshed, rejuvenated, and wide awake.

What else you need to know:
These patches can also be used to address visible laugh lines around the mouth. This formula is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty Award winner.

Research results:
In a consumer survey, tested on 102 women:
- 100% reported a reduction in dry skin
- 99% said they will continue using this product
- 89% said the eye area was softened
- 86% saw a visible reduction in dullness
- 86% reported a significant improvement in overall skin quality
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply and leave on for 15 minutes.
-Follow detailed instructions on package insert.

What it is:
A bestselling softening lotion that instantly hydrates and visibly brightens skin without adding weight.

What it is formulated to do:
One of Shiseido’s most iconic products launched in Japan over 100 years ago, this illuminating and hydrating essence is an essential step in any J-beauty routine. The fast-absorbing, silky fluid instantly absorbs and retains moisture thanks to bio-hyaluronic acid and glycerin. Exfoliating enzymes gently slough away dead skin cells, while amino acids nourish. Formulated for all skin types, this featherweight fluid used after cleanser preps the face and helps any serums or moisturizes layered over top penetrate deeper and faster.

What else you need to know:
A subtle peony scent soothes the senses as this powerful formula softens skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use daily, morning and night.

column8:
What it is:
A bestselling lip gloss that boldly creates the appearance of fuller lips with a tantalizing tingle in a high-shine, shimmering finish.

What it does:
This bestselling lip gloss delivers mesmerizing shine with a refreshing, tingly sensation. A unique peptide complex helps to create a voluminous lip look, while vitamins A and E provide lasting moisture for soft and luscious lips. It’s available in a vast range of shades and sparkly, pearlescent, or shimmering finishes that transform your look in a single swipe.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Full-on Lip Polish is available in a wide range of shades and finishes—choose from high shine, shimmer, and glitter. Some of Buxom’s favorite shades are Dolly for a shimmering mauve, Samantha for an irresistible nude, and Dominique for a clear shimmer-shine. For a can’t-miss, candy-apple red you’ll love, choose Natalie. Wear Full-On Plumping Lip Polish Gloss alone, or layer over any Buxom lip product. Pair Full-On Lip Polish with PlumpLine Lip Liner (sold separately) to take your lip look to the next level.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Wear each shade alone or over any Buxom lip product.
-Pair Full-On Lip Polish with PlumpLine Lip Liner (sold separately) to take your lip look to the next level.

-Buxom suggests wearing Dolly for a shimmering mauve, Samantha for an irresistible nude, Dominique for a clear shimmer-shine, or Natalie for a can’t-miss candy apple red (each shade sold separately).

column8:
What it is: A rich eye cream that diminishes the look of under-eye circles, shadows, puffs, and fine lines.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Circles, Dryness, and Puffiness

Formulation: Rich Cream

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: This moisture-rich eye cream diminishes the look of under-eye circles, shadows, fine lines—instantly and over time. It de-puffs, calms with moisture, strengthens skin's moisture barrier against common irritants, and is ophthalmologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.

column8:
What it is:
A skin-transforming oil to help strengthen the skin's vital lipid barrier.

What it is formulated to do:
Vita Mineral™ Omega 3 Optimum Skin Oil is formulated to re-energize and support natural skin cell activity—dramatically improving moisture levels and boosting overall skin health and vitality. It reduces visible signs of aging including fine lines, wrinkles, and sensitivity, leaving skin looking plumper and more youthful.

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply two or three drops under moisturizer or makeup morning and/or night.

What it is: A concentrated cream formulated to hydrate, replenish, and revitalize the skin overnight.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness

Formulation: Rich Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin C: Protects against free radical damage.
- Frankincense Oil: Relaxes the senses.
- Wheatgerm: Visibly improves skin firmness.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This cream goes to work during the natural process of skin renewal while you sleep, restoring a visibly radiant, smoothed, and beautiful complexion. Bio-active ingredients, including frankincense and boswellic acid, smooth the appearance of expression lines and wrinkles while imparting a subtle natural fragrance.

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

-In the evening massage onto freshly cleansed skin or after your current night serum.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This mask draws out impurities and reduces the appearance of pores—leaving skin purified, smoothed, and visibly toned.

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.

-Apply a generous amount onto clean skin.
-Allow to dry until the mask can be removed by gently rubbing the skin with fingertips.
-Rinse thoroughly with warm water or remove with a reusable washcloth.

Brush Coverage: Buildable

-Use a stippling motion to intensify coverage
-Use the pointed tip of the brush to soften edges

-To clean brush, use gentle soap and warm water.

column8:
What it is:
A hyper-saturated, water-resistant, liquid eyeliner with an innovative flex tip and easy-grip triangle shape for effortless, no-limit lining that lasts.

What it does:
Flyliner Longwear Liquid Eyeliner is your new be-all, end-all for lining eyes. It delivers everything you want in a liner, and then some. Experience the crisp color intensity of a liquid, plus the glide of a gel in one long-wearing, water-resistant formula that dries fast and won’t fade or transfer until you say when.

Featuring a smart triangle shape that makes it easy to hold, Flyliner’s all about eye-opening drama—minus the stress. It all comes down to its super-flex felt tip, an exclusive FENTY BEAUTY innovation that allows for smooth, uninterrupted ink flow from every angle. In other words? A hyper-saturated satin finish with each and every stroke—no dragging, skipping, or having to retrace your steps.

Rihanna even perfected Flyliner’s tapered precision point with all eye shapes in mind, with an extra-long, flexible tip designed for maximum versatility. Create fine lines, thick flicks, and everything in between. This is no-limit lining at its finest.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
FENTY BEAUTY is 100 percent cruelty-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake before use.
-Glide tip along the lash line, pressing gently for a fine line and increasing pressure for a more dramatic line.
-To get the most out of Flyliner, always replace cap tightly and store with the tip down.

-Artistry Pro Tip: For a natural look, dot the tip of the eyeliner between your lashes to fill in your lash line.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Florals

Key Notes: Bergamot, Peony, Amber

Fragrance Description: Inspired by the comforting scent of newly laundered tees straight from the dryer, this perfume is the essence of simplicity and comfort, blending fresh citrus with cozy amber and musk. The bright floral middle notes bring out that clean-sheets feeling.

About the Bottle: CLEAN cares about the health of the planet. Working with vendors who use green manufacturing processes and minimizing the amount of waste produced by the packaging is of paramount importance. The corn-derived cellophane is biodegradable and compostable.

About the Fragrance: Warm Cotton is inspired by the comforting scent of freshly laundered tees. CLEAN CLASSIC is a collection of simple, trusted and conscious perfumes. Casual and light, these linear fragrances allow the scent to remain intact throughout the day and are perfectly suited for layering.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Warm Florals

Key Notes: Black Orchid, Black Truffle, Patchouli

Fragrance Description: Black Orchid Eau De Parfum opens with aphrodisiacal black truffle and narcotic ylang ylang—touched with effervescent bergamot and bitter orange. Rum-soaked, sweet black plum surrounds the perfume‘s black orchid extract, while woody patchouli and creamy vanilla wrap the orchid in rich warmth.

About the Bottle: A streamlined, modern interpretation of 1920‘s and 1930‘s architecture.

About the Fragrance: Bred exclusively for Tom Ford, Black Orchid was born of his quest for "the perfect flower: luxurious, elegant, pure and sophisticated." The elusive bloom became the heart of his debut fragrance, and its complex beauty continues to lure women and men into its world.

"I have always been obsessed with finding the deepest black, black orchids. For me, it is really the perfect flower. Elegant. Luxurious. The only thing is, it didn‘t exist..." –Tom Ford
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

What it is: A 24-hour wear fluid concealer that provides full, buildable, matte coverage.

What does:
Pro Longwear Concealer provides full, buildable coverage with a comfortable matte finish. The long-lasting formula gives a smoother, flawless-looking finish on skin, helping to conceal flaws, dark spots, skin discoloration, and under-eye circles.

What else you need to know:
This concealer is non-acnegenic, water- and transfer-resistant, and dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.

-Use a circular motion for a softer diffused look.

column8:
What it is:
A rich lather shave cream for the ultimate close shave.

What it is formulated to do:
Triple Cushion™ Shave Lather is a luxurious, creamy lather that lifts whiskers up and away from the skin, for a smooth, ultra-close shave. Triple cushion technology—featuring three protective hydrating layers—allows the razor to glide close to skin while offering a cushion of protection against razor burn irritation, nicks, and cuts.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Perfect for use with or without a brush, this product is dermatologist tested and free of fragrance, alcohol, and colorant.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Activate lather with fingertips or a shaving brush.
-Shave with beard growth, not against, to avoid irritation.

column8:
What it is:
A lip liner for the ideal line and to enhance the hold of lipstick in a single swipe for truly gorgeous lips.

What it does:
This supple formula glides onto lips for easy application and is perfect for contouring your lips. Long-lasting and waterproof, it ensures zero makeup mistakes. The lip liner range features 10 colors and one universal shade to match every lipstick. The creamy waterproof formula is infused with antioxidant vitamins A and E, highly protective carnauba and candelilla waxes, as well as nourishing and revitalizing oils. This array of lip liners is specifically designed to suit all shades of Le Rouge and Rouge Interdit Lipsticks.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
-Parabens

What else you need to know:
This new range of ten Lip Liner colors is specially designed to suit all shades of Le Rouge and Rouge Interdit lipsticks. Every lipstick finds its perfect match. Each one comes with a sharpener.

Like a true professional’s tool, Lip Liner also lends itself to the most sophisticated of variations. Go modern with shaded or sculpted lips by combining two pencil shades for an edgy look that enhances the natural volume of the mouth.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Trace the contour of your lips, following their natural shape.
-Begin with the outline of your top lip.
-Place the tip of the pencil on the bow of your lip and outline the right-hand side.
-Place the tip on the bow of your lip again and outline the left-hand side.
-Then trace the contour of the lower lip.
-Begin at the center and outline the right-hand side.
-Place the tip on the bow at the center again and outline the left-hand side.

Visually increase or decrease the volume of your lips:
-Trace the contour of your lips without trying to correct their shape.
-To enlarge your lips, draw just outside of this line.
-To lessen the volume of your lips, draw just inside this line.

Tips to extend the hold of your lipstick:
-Trace the outline of your lips, then thicken the line toward the interior of the contour (ideally, cover the lips entirely with liner).
-Then apply lipstick over the liner.

Tips for an ombré look:
-Choose a lip pencil and lipstick in coordinating colors.
-Trace a precise line along the lip contour and blot the interior of the lips with a fingertip to blend.
-Apply lipstick to the center of the lips.
-Press your lips together and apply a second coat if desired, to intensify the effect.

column8:
What it is:
A lip liner collection with an extensive array of creamy, long-lasting, and waterproof formulas to customize lip looks.

What it does:
Aqua Lip makes it easy to create lip liner looks that do not smudge, feather, or fade. The ultra-creamy formula is infused with vitamin E and jojoba sax, making it easy to line and define lips for the perfect pout. This nonstop, highly pigmented color is long lasting and completely waterproof. With shades that range from nude to pop colors, these liners are perfect for any look and can be worn alone or as a base for any lip color. For the illusion of a fuller, more volumized lip, try over-drawing or line and define using a deeper shade to contour.

What else you need to know:
The Aqua collection of lip and eye colors was created for the Parisian Aquatic Ballet. Tested under water for five hours, MAKE UP FOR EVER’s longest wearing makeup has an extensive palette of high-performance colors with nonstop results.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
For defined lips:
-Line your lips using an Aqua Lip shade that matches your lipstick.
-Create depth by shading in the edges of the mouth to create definition and blend towards the center.
-Apply lipstick, starting from center of the lip and stretching to the outer corners.
-Finish with concealer outside of lip line to make the edge more defined.

Pro tip for fuller-looking lips:
-For more fullness, extend the liner just outside of the natural lip line. Fill in.
-For added dimension, use one to two shades darker than your desired lip color.
-Add your favorite gloss in the center of the top and bottom lips to create volume.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight water mist that finishes makeup, while gently soothing and refreshing skin.

What it does:
This holy grail of hydrating mists can be used with other products in near-endless ways – to sheer out foundation, intensify color, improve and extend the wear of makeup, or moisturize and soothe tired skin. The lightweight mist is packed with vitamins and minerals, infused with a blend of green tea, chamomile, and cucumber to gently soothe and refresh the skin. It provides an immediate boost of allover hydration while delivering a soft sheen to refresh and finish makeup—improving wear for up to 12 hours. The mist features a delicious twist in a romantic rose scent, calming lavender scent, or creamy coconut scent.

This product is dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested, and is non-acnegenic.

Beauty Tips:
Apply your favorite powder foundation and lightly mist Prep + Prime Fix+ all over the face to set and hydrate.

Apply your favorite eye shadow or pigment to your preferred brush, lightly mist the bristles with Prep + Prime Fix+, and sweep across lids for an intensified shadow look.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Hold bottle 12 inches away from face and spray evenly.
-Use alone or to finish makeup.
-For face products, apply your favorite powder foundation and lightly mist all over face to set and hydrate.
-For color products, apply your favorite Eye Shadow or Pigment to your preferred brush, lightly mist bristles and sweep across lids for an intensified shadow look.
-Apply your favorite highlighter to your preferred brush, lightly mist the bristles with Prep + Prime Fix+ and sweep across your face to intensify the look.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Aquatics

Key Notes: Juniper, Mandarin, Oakmoss, Aquatic Note

Fragrance Description: This Eau de Toilette opens with refreshing bergamot, juicy, sun-drenched Sicilian mandarin, and the frozen grapefruit peel and aromatic juniper. In the heart Sichaun pepper and sensual rosewood give strong masculinity and an understated blend of American muskwood, incense and oak moss establish innate sexiness.

About the Fragrance: Light Blue Pour Homme is the quintessence of joy of life and seduction, capturing the energy of the beautiful and sunny Mediterranean sea in a cologne.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Cologne is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the cologne, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column2: Dior Addict Lip Maximizer Plumping Gloss
column8:
What it is: A signature lip-plumping gloss that combines maximum hydration, comfort, and shine with an instant and long-lasting plumping effect.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: A must-have from Dior Backstage, the formula contains volumizing spheres of hyaluronic acid for powerful hydration and a fuller lip effect. The minty scent gives lips a refreshing sensation.

Clinical Results: In an instrumental test carried out on 10 subjects:
- 24-hour hydration and lasting volume
- +29% instant volume

In an instrumental test carried out on 20 subjects, makeup effect at T + 4 weeks:
- +86% smoothing effect after 4 weeks
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-How-to by Peter Philips: "Start by applying Lip Glow, followed by the same shade of Lip Maximizer to achieve not only a spectacular makeup result, but also to combine lip care and volumizing benefits."

column8:
What it is:
A tinted brow gel.

What it is formulated to do:
For those with thin, sparse brows, this unique, botanical formula gives the appearance of fuller, thicker brows. The combination of cream and gel effortlessly defines and fills in the look of brows while controlling and shaping without flaking or fading.

What else you need to know:
The non-greasy formula can easily be removed at night with a facial cleanser or makeup remover. Housed in a sleek, portable tube that allows for precise, no-mess application, Anastasia's Tinted Brow Gel is perfect for instant brow touch-ups anyplace, anytime. It's the must-have tool for any beauty-savvy woman.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-For a natural, highlighting effect, apply over brow powder or pencil.
-Brow gel blends with hair color, and it can be used to touch up roots in between hair color touch ups.

What it is:
A Fix+ formula now infused with pearlescent particles for the ultimate glow.

What it does:
The Fan-favorite Fix+ mist is now infused with pearlescent particles for the ultimate glow. This formula still carries all the hydrating, soothing, and refreshing benefits of the original version, extending the wear of makeup for up to 12 hours. The addition of pearl gives an ultra-illuminating effect, for skin that looks both healthy and radiant.

This product has been ophthalmologist- and dermatologist-tested. It is non-acnegenic, and suitable for all skin types.

Beauty Tip:
Spray it before makeup to create a dewy canvas. Spray it over makeup for an ultra-natural makeup look. Use it to rehydrate makeup throughout the day to freshen your look and enhance its finish.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake well to disperse pearlescent particles before each use.
-Hold bottle eight to 12 inches away from face and mist directly onto skin, while keeping eyes and mouth closed.

What it is:
A lightweight, medicated treatment that helps prevent acne.

What it is formulated to do:
This oil-free face lotion helps treat existing acne and prevent future breakouts. The third step in Clinique's Acne Solutions Clear Skin System, it creates a barrier against acne-causing agents, controls excess oil, and soothes skin. It clears acne and visibly reduces redness—while its hydration properties minimize dryness and peeling.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply thin layer to face in the morning and evening.
-If drying or peeling occurs, reduce usage.
-For best results, use after Acne Solutions Cleansing Foam and Clarifying Lotion.
-After acne clears, continue using for preventative care.

What it is: A gentle, medicated liquid exfoliator that reduces excess oil and shine, mattifies skin‘s appearance, and unclogs pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, dullness and uneven texture, acne, and blemishes

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.
- Silica: Absorbs excess oil to give skin a matte look.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This liquid exfoliator is powered by salicylic acid which keeps skin looking clear. It contains exfoliating ingredients to sweep away dead surface cells and reduces excess oil that can lead to blemishes. It is also formulated with oil-absorbing powders to diminish the look of shine, leaving skin feeling clean and feeling fresh.

Try Clinique‘s Clear Skin System: a consistent, non-irritating routine helps get blemishes under control. Clinique‘s Acne Solutions™ Clear Skin System helps provide skin with a clear appearance and helps keep it that way.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Shake well.
-Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Avoid eye area and lips.
-Follow with a lightweight, oil-free hydrator like Dramatically Different™ Oil-Free Gel (sold separately).

column8:
What it is: A cleansing foam formulated for acne-prone skin that helps clear and target the look of blemishes and pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Remove dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.
- Laminaria Saccharina Extract: Helps fight oil buildup that can lead to blemishes.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This daily cleanser with two percent salicylic acid removes dirt and excess oil. It also helps clear pores for healthier-looking skin.

Try Clinique‘s Clear Skin System: A consistent, non-irritating routine that fights the look of blemishes. Clinique‘s Acne Solutions™ Clear Skin System provides skin with a clear appearance and helps keep it that way.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Pump two to three times.
-Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area.
-Rinse thoroughly and pat skin dry.
-Follow with Acne Solutions™ Clarifying Lotion and Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing Gel (each sold separately).
-After blemishes visibly clear, continue using for preventive care.
-If dryness or peeling occur, reduce usage.

column8:
What it is:
A non-drying, triple milled soap infused with the bright scent of Mangosteen Eau de Parfum.

What it is formulated to do:
Made with a premium formula that has a pure vegetable oil base enriched with moisturizing shea butter, for supremely soft skin. Because the soap is triple milled, there are no air pockets in the bar, making the soap dense, long-lasting, and extra luxurious. It also intensifies the energizing, succulent scent of mangosteen.

What else you need to know:
Known as the "Queen of all Fruit" because of its high content of powerful antioxidants, this succulent fruit is native to Southeast Asia. The bright, exotic, uplifting scent is the perfect morning pick-me-up and is completely addictive. It'll literally put a smile on your face!

What it is:
A magnetized contour stick in a longwear, light-as-air matte formula in a range of shades for all skin tones.
Coverage:
✔ Medium

Formulation: Stick

Finish:
✔ Matte

Ingredient Callouts: Free of Parabens and Phthalates. This product is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free.

What else you need to know:
The buildable cream-to-powder formula is weightless and super easy to blend—no creasing or caking. The stick format makes it easy to use for targeted application anywhere you want to contour. All Match Stix Skinsticks click together so you can mix and match for all your contour, highlighting, and concealing needs.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-For the first step of the Fenty face, create a soft, matte base: Swipe Matte Skinstick onto skin and blend with fingers or with the Portable Contour & Concealer Brush.
-Artistry pro tip: use your fingers to warm the product on the back of your hand before tapping onto skin.

What it is:
A lip color primer, base treatment stick.

What it is formulated to do:
An indispensable match for your lipstick, the first smoothing base in stick form that defines, smoothes, and plumps the lips, leaving them perfectly prepared for lasting lipstick hold. The new formula includes microbeads that expand as soon as they are in contact with the natural moisture of your lips adding volume and contour.

What else you need to know:
KissKiss Liplift comes in a new gilded metal case designed by the talented jeweler Herve Van Der Straeten.

column8:
Fragrance Family:
Floral

Scent Type:
Fruity Florals

Key Notes:
Strawberry, Violet Leaves, Jasmine

About:
Charmingly simple with a signature quality, Daisy Marc Jacobs transports you to a place that’s optimistic, beautiful, and pure. The top of the fragrance is infused with succulent wild berries and soft white violets. At the heart, velvety jasmine warms to a dreamy dry-down of sensual sandalwood, for a romantic, lingering finish.

Irresistibly feminine, Daisy Marc Jacobs is the captivating creation of master perfumer Alberto Morillas.

What else you need to know:
Whimsical white daisies abloom on its cap give the iconic Daisy bottle a retro-cool twist—as charming and unique as the woman who wears the fragrance.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

column8:
What it is:
A collection of purse-size, pigment-powered eyeshadow palettes made to mesmerize—and collect.

What it does:
Each Cover Shots palette has a curated mix of colors, formulas, and finishes so you can nail the latest trends and create your own looks. Each portable palette includes six eyeshadows and two double-size base shades in a range of finishes. The shades give you intense pigment payoff and superior blendability and were inspired by makeup trends seen and shot at Smashbox’s LA creative photo studio.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
These versatile makeup palettes are curated to spark your creativity with customizable eye looks using the season’s most-coveted colors. Find your vibe within every eyeshadow palette (sold separately):

Punked (wearable-to-rebellious looks): Cause a riot with a mix of cool, grunge-inspired grays, warm mauves, nudes, and punched-up purples in vixeny velvets and shimmers. It’s everything you need for a range of wearable-to-rebellious looks.

Ablaze (hot, desert-inspired shades): With shades in rich red clay and hot terra cotta, this palette captures the warmth of the desert in a range of sun-drenched shades—these dimensional pigments are perfect for adding depth and contouring.

Golden Hour (creamy, lit-from-within shades): This palette’s finishes range from matte to sparkle, and the sultry, golden shades are rich and creamy so you can blend and build a custom smolder.

Matte (high coverage, velvety): This palette offers mattes that never fall flat. It’s lush, soft, and velvety with ultra-high coverage, and includes matte eyeshadow shades in warm nudes, cool mauves, and a deep, dramatic black.

Smoky (effortless and modern): Perfect for creating a smoky eye, these mid-to-darker tones amp up intensity with a blend of matte, low shimmers, and high-shimmer shades.

Softlight (soft-focus, wearable shimmers): The ultra-flattering hues include champagne and rosé-inspired colors to highlight the eyes with low-level shimmer for a subtle shine that goes on smoothly for a glowing look.

Pinks & Palms (fiercely feminine looks): This high-pigment, limited-edition palette mixes mattes, metallics, shimmering pinks, sunlit gold tones, and a hint of mint. It’s perfect for creating a fiercely feminine look inspired by soft, pink LA skies.

Major Metals (hyper-reflective metallic shades): Spoil your lids with fit-for-a-queen coppers, royal maroons, and brilliant bronzes. These shadows have a creamy powder formula that glides on a molten metallic finish in one swipe.

Minimalist (effortlessly versatile neutrals): Create countless looks with minimal effort. This neutral mix of ultra-blendable mattes and shimmers creates no-makeup makeup looks, contours lids, and effortlessly blends a smoky eye.

Prism (planetary pastels): These creamy, pastel powders create a spectrum of one-swipe holographic looks. The palette includes 2 duo-chrome shade transformers to give any shadow a game-changing, sparkly finish.

Petal Metal (petal-soft rose-gold shades): This wearable rainbow of petal-soft, rose gold glides on in one swipe. Each shade beautifully blooms to create effortless, matte day looks and sultry metallic evening looks!

Bold Glitter (daring & vibrant glitter): A colorful range of saturated shades with an insanely sparkly finish. Layer them over mattes or rock them solo—these shadows are designed to shine!


This product is cruelty-free, and is formulated without sodium lauryl sulfate or fragrance.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Choose base color and blend onto lids.
-Play with mix-and-match shades and layer to create your own cover look.
-Studio Tip: Use a light, pearlized shadow as a highlighter or mix shadow with 24 Hour Eyeshadow Primer (sold separately) for a long-wearing lid tint.

A medium-size foundation/blush brush.

Hourglass designed their makeup brush collection to be supremely soft, decidedly luxurious, and PETA-friendly. Takelon bristles are made from high-grade synthetic fibers to maximize product application, avoid potential allergic reactions to animal fur, and promote the use of non-animal products.

Hourglass products are 100 percent cruelty-free.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy

Scent Type: Warm and Sweet Gourmand

Key Notes: Amber, Jasmine, Peach, Vanilla

Fragrance Description: Sensuous and timeless, The One Eau de Parfum is the essence of the DOLCE&GABBANA woman. This floral fragrance combines contemporary fruit ingredients with the perfumer‘s classic palette of white flowers. The scent opens with sparkling bergamot and mandarin blended with notes of lychee and peach. Heart notes of Madonna lily express a voluptuous intensity and enveloping femininity followed by the seductive dry-down of vanilla, amber, and musk.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Warm Floral

Key Notes: Jasmine Sambac, Cashmeran Wood, Amber Gris

Fragrance Description: The woody-floral fragrance borders the realms of spirituality and sensuality with a blend of soft lavender atop a base of cashmeran wood and white amber, exuding a positive energy with each mist of the sensual women's scent.

About the Bottle: The refillable amethyst-inspired bottle symbolizes femininity and refinement. Accented by metallic gold, the warm floral women's perfume is encapsulated within.

About the Fragrance: Thierry Mugler envisioned Alien as a sensation—the moment that occurs before a miracle. There is silence, fullness, and an expectancy of the supernatural. The bold floral perfume is named Alien because inside every woman is something so unique, so special, it is Alien to everything around her.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

Accented by metallic gold, the warm floral women's perfume is encapsulated within.About the Fragrance: Thierry Mugler envisioned Alien as a sensation—the moment that occurs before a miracle. There is silence, fullness, and an expectancy of the supernatural. The bold floral perfume is named Alien because inside every woman is something so unique, so special, it is Alien to everything around her.

Highlighted Ingredients:
- 24-Karat Gold Flakes: provide luxurious radiance.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens.

What Else You Need to Know: This luxurious and hydrating gel primer seamlessly melts into the skin to provide a more even and long-lasting finish under makeup, to smooth the appearance of fine lines, and to tighten skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Take a small amount of gel on the back of your hand, and gently apply to your face, working outward to even out creases and smooth the look of lines.
-Wait a few seconds before applying foundation.
-The secret of absolute radiance: Mix a few drops of fluid foundation and L’Or in the palm of your hand for an incredibly-light texture.

What it is:
A flat, fan-shaped brush for featherweight application and excess product removal.

What does:
This flat, fan-shaped brush features a blend of soft, synthetic fibers. It can be used for featherweight application and blending of pigments and powders or as a tool to gently clear the skin of any excess product. MAC professional brushes are hand-sculpted and assembled using the finest quality materials. Their 100-percent synthetic brushes incorporate the latest innovations in fiber technology for excellent performance and improved longevity.

Fragrance Family:
Floral

Scent Type:
Fruity Florals

Key Notes:
Raspberry, Magnolia, Ambered Vetiver

About:
A glamorous and sophisticated aromatic Eau de Toilette, Hot Couture creates an elegance that can only be equated with couture runway fashion. Sweet raspberry nectar, magnolia, and ambered vetiver combine to bewitch with vibrant, confident, and passionate femininity. With daring glamour and refined elegance, this sensual fragrance slips on like a second skin.

The definition of couture, Hot Couture enhances a woman's body like a Haute Couture creation. It embodies the spontaneous spirit of Givenchy couture—original, provocative and full of charisma with a slender and tall bottle.

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Probiotic (Lactobacillus): Helps strengthen skin’s natural barrier and restore balance to its microbiome, visibly calming irritation.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil.

What Else You Need to Know: This extra-gentle, oil-free cream soothes persistent redness and blotchiness. Over time, it helps improve skin’s comfort and lessens the look of broken capillaries.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use twice a day, morning and night.
-Apply over makeup-free skin, avoiding eye area.
-For more redness relief, use after Clinique Redness Solutions Soothing Cleanser.

Precautions:
-Wear sunscreen every day—redness-prone skins may be more sensitive to sun exposure. Try Clinique Redness Solutions Daily Protective Base SPF 15.

column8:
What it is: A featherweight eye primer that locks down eyeshadows for up to 24 hours.

Skin Type: Normal, Oily, Dry, Combination

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This primer locks down eyeshadows, intensifying color to ensure waterproof, crease-free coverage for up to 24 hours. The ultra-lightweight formula glides effortlessly onto lids, leaving a smooth, even canvas for budge-proof shadow application. It can be used with powder or cream eyeshadow products.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake prior to use.
-Using your fingertip, apply a very thin layer to clean, dry lids.
-Wait 30 seconds to apply eyeshadow.
-The needle-nose applicator is perfect for no-waste, precise dispensing.

column8:
What it is:
An ultra-slim, retractable pencil for precise detailing and creating hair-like strokes.
What it does:
Brow Wiz's ultra-fine, retractable tip is perfect for spot-filling in areas where brow hair is sparse by mimicking fine, hair-like strokes. This pencil is idea for places where your arches may be bare or over-tweezed, and the smudge-proof formula stays put day for fresh, natural-looking brows.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates
What else you need to know:
Some names are changing, but the shades will remain exactly the same so you can shade match across the entire Anastasia collection.
This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Use Brow Wiz to create a perfect arch that follows your natural bone structure:
-Brush you brow hair up vertically with the spooley end and draw a thin line along the hairline following the lower arch.
-Brush your brow hair down and define the top of your brow arch in the same way.
-Fill in any gaps or sparse areas and groom the color through your brows.

column8:
What it is:
A lightweight daily moisturizing cream that relieves and calms super-sensitive skin.

What it is formulated to do:
Formulated to rescue skin from external aggressors like harsh weather and provide comfort after dermatological procedures and surgeries, Pure Cloud Cream pampers and calms seriously stressed skin. It offers intense hydration, helps relieve skin irritation and discomfort, and helps heal skin.

What else you need to know:
This product is free of fragrance and dye.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing with Glacial Face Wash, smooth a small amount over face and throat morning and evening.

column8:
What it is: A cult-favorite exfoliating mask packed with fruit acids clinically shown to boost skin’s radiance and firmness in 100 percent of individuals.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Glycolic Acid from Pineapple Extract: Gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells.
- Lactic Acid from Passion Fruit: Smooths and refines the look of skin‘s texture.
- Papain from Papaya: Further removes dead skin cells to rejuvenate the overall appearance of skin texture and radiance.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: An exfoliating yet gentle multi-action AHA mask that helps to remove dead skin cells and reduce the appearance of fine lines and imperfections while boosting skin’s radiance and firmness, leaving skin feeling smoother and tighter.

Clinical Results: In a clinical trial with 22 female subjects (ages 40–55) after 30 minutes from one application, results included:
- 100% of consumers showed firmer- and more radiant-looking skin
- 91% said they had a visibly brighter and more radiant complexion
- 96% said they skin felt softer, visibly smoother, and plumper

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a generous amount to clean skin. Avoid the eye area.
-Leave on for 10 minutes and relax.
-Rinse with lukewarm water or a damp washcloth.
-A slight tingling sensation is normal.

column8:
What it is:
A highly moisturizing, anti-dark circles eye cream formulated with Shiseido's cutting-edge brightening technology.

What it is formulated to do:
Specially developed with a breakthrough ingredient, this eye cream combats the two major causes of dark circles: pigmented melanin (brown circles) and poor micro-circulation (blue circles). It defies dark circles by supporting natural melanin production—helping to visibly fade existing pigmentation and support natural microcirculation over time.

What else you need to know:
This product contains multi-luminizing powder with light diffusing properties to instantly bring luminosity to eye areas. It has been dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Pat gently onto undereye area, then blend using gentle circular massaging motions with the ring finger.
-Apply each morning and night as the last step in your skin care routine.
