column8:
What it is:
A lengthening mascara that stays put for 24 hours without smudging or smearing.

What it does:
This mascara leaves lashes looking gorgeous for up to 24 hours, lasting through rain, sweat, humidity, and tears. It removes easily with warm water, and it’s unique brush coats and beautifully lengthens even the tiniest of lashes.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is allergy-tested, ophthalmologist-tested, and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. It is also free of SLS, mineral oil, and gluten, and is 100 percent fragrance-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Innovative thermal technology that helps it stay put for 24 hours is also easy to remove.
-Use fingertips to splash warm water (bath temperature is ideal) on lashes several times and press gently.
-Or, wet a cotton pad with warm water, press to eye, then wipe away.

What it is: A state-of-the-art primer that extends the wear of foundation for a perfect complexion—elevate your foundation to unprecedented performance.

Formulation: Cream

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Titanium Dioxide 2.45%: Protects skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays.
- Zinc Oxide 4.2%: Provides physical protection from damaging UVA rays.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: With a texture unlike any other, this oil free primer not only creates a smooth, even canvas for makeup, but also conceals redness, minimizes the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles, and provides broad spectrum SPF 15 protection, all in a supremely airy, silky, cloud-like texture.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply half a pump to one full pump of Veil Mineral Primer to clean, moisturized skin prior to concealer, foundation, and powder application.
-Works with any cream, liquid, and powder foundation.

What it is:
A luxurious, rose-scented, antiaging moisturizer for a hydrated, smooth, and luminous complexion.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Dullness
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
This lightweight, superior moisturizer is loaded with powerful antioxidants and nourishing nutrients to help firm skin's appearance and minimize the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Perricone's Face Finishing Moisturizer is rich in texture and hydrates the skin, imparting a visibly radiant and smooth appearance. The unique formulation contains alpha lipoic acid, vitamin C ester, and DMAE to help decrease dryness associated with daily activities.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This formula is designed to work synergistically with Face Finishing Moisturizer Tint (sold separately). To deliver maximum results, use Face Finishing Moisturizer Tint in the morning and Face Finishing Moisturizer at night.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing skin and applying Perricone MD treatment, use fingertips to apply liberally to face in gentle circular motions.
-Use in the morning and evening.
-Follow with a sunscreen in the morning.

Precautions:
-Perform a patch test before use by dabbing a small amount on the neck or below the ear for three consecutive days.
-A tingling or warming sensation is normal.
-If extreme redness or irritation occurs, discontinue use.

-A tingling or warming sensation is normal.

✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry

What it is:
A peptide-rich treatment that minimizes the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles while enhancing skin’s suppleness and elasticity.

Solutions for:
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
Prepare to change how your skin looks, feels, and behaves with this age-defying and coveted antiaging essential. A highly advanced and proprietary treatment, the luxurious cream addresses loss of elasticity and minimizes the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles, while also reversing the signs of photo damage. Skin is revitalized and takes on a more youthful, smooth, supple appearance.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Dr. Perricone’s proprietary neuropeptide technology activates the surface renewal of the skin and can help revive dullness, minimize discoloration, firm, and reduce the appearance of under-eye circles, fine lines, and wrinkles.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Smooth over face and neck.
-Use daily, or two to three times per week, in place of both morning and evening treatments.

Precautions:
-Perform a patch test before use by dabbing a small amount on the neck or below the ear for three consecutive days.
-A tingling or warming sensation is normal.
-If extreme redness or irritation occurs, discontinue use.

What it is: An anti-aging facial serum that provides intense hydration and makes the skin appear smooth, plump, radiant, and revitalized.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Oiliness

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

What Else You Need to Know: Re-formulated with the new aquacomplex advance—the latest skincare technology—that promotes the flow of water to the skin to instantly rehydrate itself. Day after day, the moisturized skin is protected against the risk of future dehydration.

Clinical Results: After 4 weeks of use:
- 63% more hydrated skin
- 36% decrease in the look of wrinkles
- 55% more plumped appearance of skin

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply the Super Aqua Hydrating Anti-Aging Serum morning and/or evening to the face and neck following application of your toner.

column8:
What it is: A moisturizer packed with soothing botanicals to provide hydration, protect from environmental stress, and neutralize irritation for sensitive skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients
- Blackcurrant Seed Oil: Rich in omega 3, it nourishes and soothes while moisturizing the skin barrier.
- Seabuckthorn Oil: Rich in omega 7, it softens skin.
- Camellia Oil: Replenishes the skin with moisture.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This bestselling cream is formulated with a blend of potent antioxidants, soothing extracts, and nourishing oils. Its complex of natural bio-actives works together to strengthen skin, restore calm, neutralize irritation, and protect against external aggressors such as pollution and free radicals.

Clean + Planet Positive at Sephora
When you see our Clean + Planet Positive seal, this brand's products are formulating without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and environment. They also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more: For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

On top of meeting the Clean at Sephora formulated without list, these brands are on a mission to do right by your routine and the planet by making climate commitments and focusing on sustainable sourcing, responsible packaging, and environmental giving.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Take a pea-size amount (one-half or one pump of cream), and warm it in the palms of your hands.
-Press and massage into skin until fully absorbed.

column8:
What it is: A hydrating mask famous for its cloud-like whipped texture that leaves skin super-smooth and dewy.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Black Tea Complex of Kombucha, Black Tea Extract, Blackberry Leaf Extract, and Lychee Seed Extract: Proven to inhibit damaging free radicals and helps to improve skin elasticity.

What Else You Need to Know: This advanced antioxidant treatment melts onto skin and instantly softens with a cooling sensation (the tingle tells you it’s working!) to reveal a luminous complexion. It's powered by Fresh's black tea complex, skin-smoothing polysaccharides, and moisturizing hyaluronic acid spheres.

Clinical Results: In an in vivo test:
- 91% said this mask softened their skin and left it silky and velvety
- 88% felt this mask gave them supple skin
- 84% reported this mask smoothed their skin

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, apply a generous amount to damp skin, avoiding the eye area.
-Leave on for five to 10 minutes and rinse.
-Use two to three times per week.
-For an extra-refreshing experience, stash this mask in the fridge to enhance its cooling effect.
-Apply this mask before a night out to create a smooth canvas for easy makeup application.

A luxurious balance of science and nature, this cleanser helps reveal purified, pampered skin.

This instant, air-light foam cleanser gently removes makeup and surface impurities in seconds to reveal fresh skin.

This product is dermatologist-tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Massage over wet face and throat.
-Rinse with lukewarm water.
-Avoid contact with eyes.
-If contact occurs, flush with water.
-Follow with Tonique Radiance for clarified and luminous skin.

column8:
What it is: A cult-favorite, sheer- and shimmer-free, brightening concealer pen used to create an all-over, natural highlight.

Coverage: Light

Finish: Radiant

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Antioxidant Vitamin E and Ruscus Extract: Visibly reduces signs of fatigue.
- Moroccan Calendula Extract: Soothes and protects skin.


What Else You Need to Know: This liquid concealer brightens darkness and dullness with light-reflecting technology that produces a natural, glowy skin look while smoothing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Formulated without shimmer, this sheer highlighting pen can be used all over the face and as an under-eye brightener.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply the brightening concealer on bare skin or over makeup with just one click and blend with your fingertips, brush, or sponge.
-Leave the concealer on the skin for a couple seconds to warm the product. This will allow it to blend better.
-Tap into the skin with your finger for a bright, luminous appearance.
-To brighten the overall face and create a three-dimensional effect, use the concealer down the bridge of the nose, the brow bones, above the brow, on the tops of the cheeks, and a touch to the middle of the forehead.

column8:
What it is: A 100 percent pure, multitasking moisturizer made of the highest-quality argan oil for visibly smoother, healthier, more hydrated skin, hair, and nails.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Oil

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Pure Argan Oil 100%: A rich source of fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This multitasking oil contains just one ingredient in its most pure and potent form: ethically sourced, UNESCO-protected argan nuts. The argan nuts are hand-cracked at women-led coops in Morocco and then cold-pressed to lock in essential fatty acids and antioxidants—for intense hydration and a dewy, visible all-over glow.

Clinical Results: In 4 weeks, this oil has been clinically shown to:
- Visibly improve the appearance of fine lines and coarse wrinkles
- Significantly improve skin smoothness and hydration

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
For your face:
-Warm two to four drops of oil in your hands, and press into your skin day and night.
-Use as the last step in your routine.

For your under-eye area:
-Use to intensely hydrate and reduce the appearance of fine lines.

For your hair:
-Use to treat split ends and minimize flyaways.

For your nails:
-Use to condition your cuticles.

For your body:
-Use to visibly firm your skin and soften rough patches.

Recycling Instructions:
-The packaging is fully recyclable through TerraCycle.

column8:
What it is:
A mascara with an innovative oblique brush that curls and defines lashes.

What it does:
Diorshow Iconic Mascara is the latest in Dior's dazzling range of bestselling mascaras. Created backstage for fashion shows and celebrity red carpet events, the Iconic mascara features an oblique cut brush that gives an extra lash-curling effect. With its long, skinny teeth, the plastic comb brush allows you to precisely coat each lash one-by-one, creating a long, separated fan of lashes that usually takes the skill of a makeup artist. The extra-hold formula provides a 24 hour-curl with 100% smudge-proof results.

What else you need to know:
Inspired by the tailoring technique of cutting fabric on the bias to create maximum curve, the Iconic brush features soft silicone bristles that spiral around the stem to lift, curl, and separate every lash.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply Iconic alone for a fabulously eye-opening effect, or apply as a lash-curling base coat underneath classic Diorshow.

column8:
What it is:
A creamy, 24-hour wear lip pencil that lines and primes lips.

What it does:
Get primed and ready with Urban Decay’s 24/7 Glide-On Lip Pencil. This long-lasting, waterproof liner glides on smoothly to prime and define lips for long-lasting lip color and clean lines. It features a wide array of shades that coordinate with Vice Lipstick.

Use 24/7 Lip Pencil to fill in your lips completely, prime them for lipstick or gloss, and lock onto color. It even prevents color from feathering out of bounds. The waterproof formula glides on smoothly, stays creamy, and defines your lips with gorgeous color, while never feeling dry or cakey. Formulated with moisturizing vitamin E, jojoba oil, and cottonseed oil, it nourishes lips every time you apply.

What else you need to know:
The shade-matched barrels make it easy to find the exact color you need.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Prime and define with 24/7 Glide-On Lip Pencil, then follow with the matching shade of Vice Lipstick from Urban Decay for intense color payoff.

column8:
What it is:
An ultimate two-in-one Pencil Sharpener featuring premium-quality blades that perfectly sharpen both jumbo and regular pencils with no mess.

What it does:
The Urban Decay sharpener you know and love has a new look—including a tight-fitting lid for less mess. Designed for use with the entire 24/7 lineup, this multitasker includes two sharpeners: a slim one for 24/7 Glide-On Eye and Lip Pencils and a large one for 24/7 Concealer Pencils. Each blade is made of durable steel infused with one percent carbon to prevent rust.

What else you need to know:
Each blade is made of durable steel infused with 1% carbon to prevent rust. This sharpener includes a plastic pick for scraping and dislodging shavings to keep the blades free of gunk. This sharpener also works with most other brands' big and small pencils (if you must).
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Sharpen your cosmetic pencils until the tip has reached desired length.
-For a hygienic pencil, empty the container after each use.

column8:
What it is: An oil-free face primer that absorbs quickly, leaving skin looking blurred and softened, creating a smooth face base for a long-lasting makeup look.

Formulation: Gel

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skin Concerns: Pores, Dullness, Oiliness

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This long-lasting face primer with Elasto-Smooth technology refines the look of skin texture and diffuses light to blur the look of imperfections for a smooth makeup base. This primer for oily, normal, and dry skin is oil-free, allowing makeup to last all day.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply this Makeup primer directly onto skin and gently massage until skin feels smooth to the touch.
-Allow for a few seconds of drying time before applying your makeup over top of the primer.

column2: Flash Color Palette Multi-use Cream Color Palette
column8:
What it is: A must-have, iconic palette for pro artists and enthusiasts with 12 boldly-pigmented cream shades create endless looks for eyes, lips, face, and more.

What Else You Need to Know: Each shade of this thick, highly-blendable formula seamlessly covers skin with dynamic color. This multiuse palette is ideal for any level of artistry—from artistic and special effects to contouring and foundation mixing. Achieving next-level results is simple with this versatile pro-essential.

This Palette Contains:
(Each sold separately)

Neutral Palette:
- 12 x 0.21 oz/ 6 g Flash Color in Grey, Neutral Brown, Purple Grey, Rosewood, Dark Antique Pink, Ivory, Livid, Kaki, Pink Brown, Fresh Pink, Sienna, Rusty Brown

Artistic Palette:
- 12 x 0.21 oz/ 6 g Flash Color in 04 Gold, 02 Coral, 00 Turquoise, 25 Fuchsia, 13 Yellow, 23 Brown, 03 Silver, 10 White, 24 Red, 14 Bright Blue, 8 Leaf Green, 11 Black
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start by using a small amount of product (a little goes a long way with this formula) and apply where desired.
-Set with a setting powder such as Super Matte Loose Powder (sold separately).
-If using around the eyes, use a shade of Artist Shadow (sold separately) similar to the Flash color to set and intensify color.
-Finish with Mist and Fix Setting Spray (sold separately).

The new fragrance for men, Versace Pour Homme, blends essential ingredients of Mediterranean origin to hit aromatic notes that match the man of today: knowledgeable and self-confident, he has the ability to live in harmony with the natural world. Dynamic and entrepreneurial, the Versace Pour Homme man communicates his forceful and passionate character through this decidedly masculine fragrance.

Notes:
Bergamot, Neroli, Citron of Diamante, Bitter Orange Leaves, Geranium, Clary Sage, Blue Hyacinth, Cedarwood, Old Wood, Mineral Amber, Tonka Bean, Musk.
Style:
Strong. Virtuosic. Unique.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Fruity Floral

Key Notes: Black Grape, Pink Peony, White Musk

Fragrance Description: Inspired by the British woman in a lighthearted mood, Burberry Brit Sheer is fresh, airy, joyful, optimistic, and lively, combining shimmering notes of pink peony with black grape and a touch of musk.

About the Bottle: A beautiful, sheer-pink glass bottle celebrates the scent‘s peony heart. Its iconic checkered print is overlaid with transparent tones for a modern twist.

About the Fragrance: Led by the principles of British design, innovation, and craftsmanship and presented in expertly crafted glass bottles, Burberry fragrances draw their inspiration from music, fashion, London, and British icons.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

What it is:
A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.

Solutions for:
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
Remove makeup and cleanse skin gently and naturally with Josie's ready-to-go, pre-moistened portable Bear Naked Wipes. Infused with argan oil, aloe vera, chamomile, and cucumber, these biodegradable wipes are luxuriously soft and kind to tender eyes and skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
In support of the Natural Resources Defense Council's Polar Bear SOS initiative, a portion of every package of Bear Naked Wipes sold will go to protect these endangered animals.

This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without gluten, GMO, synthetic fragrance, and formaldehyde.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Gently wipe towelette over face, neck, and decolleté to remove dirt, oil, and makeup to refresh and cleanse.
-Use additional towelette to fully remove more intricate eye makeup.
-Reseal tab after each use to ensure fresh wipes every time.

Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy

Scent Type: Woody Spices

Key Notes: Cardamom, Cedarwood, Ginger, Tobacco

Fragrance Description: Elegant and sensual, this perfume is decidedly modern and uniquely timeless all at once. The fragrance perfectly reflects the DOLCE&GABBANA man: Charismatic, seductive, and sophisticated, he loves taking care of himself. The spicy fragrance features fresh top notes of grapefruit, coriander, and basil; a warm heart of cardamom and ginger; and a deep masculine base of tobacco, amber, and cedarwood.

What it is:
A double-ended matte and shimmer brow highlighter.

What it does:
This silky Anastasia Highlighting Duo Pencil features a matte highlighter on one end and a shimmer highlighter on the other. Use the matte side during the day to create a soft highlight, and for evening looks, use the shimmer side to give eyes that soft, satiny glow. It’s formulated with vitamin E and features light-diffusing pigments that even skin tone.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use in the corners of eyes to bring attention to beautiful eye shadow, or highlight the bridge of your nose, the tops of cheekbones, and the cupid’s bow to create an instant glow and add proportion to the face.

column8:
What it is:
A volumizing mascara that dramatically defines, lengthens, and lifts for fuller-looking, ultra-black lashes, minus any clumps.

What it does:
Give your lashes a visible lift with this cult-favorite mascara that delivers up to three times the volume in as little as a single stroke. The hourglass-shaped brush boasts dense, molded bristles that grip every hard-to-reach lash for dramatic definition, major length, and serious curl. Infused with glossy, patent leather pigments, vitamins, and antioxidants, this mascara nourishes and softens for fierce, flexible, fanned-out lashes.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product does not contain synthetic fragrances, synthetic dyes, or petrochemicals.

Research Results:
In a US consumer study of 30 women using the product:
- 94% of women saw immediate volume
- 97% of women saw an increase in length
- 93% of women said the mascara was easy to remove
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After applying mascara, use the tip of the nylon brush to push and lift.
-Use the brush to push inner corner lashes toward the bridge of the nose.
-Use the brush to push center lashes toward the middle of your brow.
-Use the brush to push outer corner lashes toward your hairline.

column8:
What it is:
A top-selling makeup sponge, the super-soft, exclusive, latex-free foam quickly blends makeup for an easy application and flawless, skin-like finish.

What it does:
The unique shape and exclusive material available only with beautyblender® ensures impeccable, streak-free application with minimum product waste. Use it with foundations, powders, and any other complexion product. Now, the award-winning makeup sponge is available in a fun, limited-edition canister—fit for any beauty queen.

What else you need to know:
Made with the same exclusive ultra-plush foam as the original beautyblender. When wet, it becomes mega soft and mimics pores to create a natural airbrushed application easily. Plus, it absorbs water, not makeup, so your fave formulas land on your skin, not in your sponge. Made in the USA.

It is cruelty-free and formulated without latex, parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty winner.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Wet beautyblender with water for each use.
-Squeeze out excess liquid, using a towel if necessary.
-Bounce foundation, bb cream, powder, or any other base and complexion product across the face for flawless results.
-Cleanse with your favorite Blendercleanser® formula after each use to remove makeup and grime.
-Replace every three to six months upon signs of wear and tear.

column8:
What it is:
A sponge and brush cleanser that’s free of dyes and skin irritants.

What it does:
This cleanser supports the integrity of the beautyblender® as it removes excess residue and germs for a clean makeup application. The cleanser’s soothing soy-based, low-suds formula breaks down rapidly making it earth-friendly, while the light lavender scent makes it fun to use.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is handcrafted in the USA.

The blendercleanser formula offers protection against 99.7 percent of harmful germs (even if stains are left behind), plus continuous protection from 99.9 percent of harmful germs 24hrs after washing (even if stains are left behind).
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Wet your beautyblender® or makeup brushes.
-Apply a dime-sized amount of liquid blendercleanser® to solid areas of beautyblender.
-Work into lather, rinse, and repeat if necessary. Squeeze to remove excess water.
-Great for pre-soaking to clean stubborn stains.
-Set beautyblender or makeup brushes out to dry.

-Set beautyblender or makeup brushes out to dry.

What it is:
A set of two TSA-approved, travel-size hydrating facial sprays that deliver powered micro-droplets of pure evian® natural mineral water in leak-proof canisters.

Solutions for:
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
With its powerful micro-droplet mist, evian Brumisateur® Mineral Water Spray hydrates, tones, and refreshes skin throughout the day. It’s the only facial mist that can care for your skin on a daily basis with the purity of evian Natural Mineral Water. A favorite of skin care professionals, hypo-allergenic evian Facial Spray with a neutral pH is compatible with all skin types and can enhance all skin care regimes. It can also help remove perspiration, ocean salt, and pool chlorine from the skin. Use it as a setting spray. A light misting over makeup can revive color throughout the day.

This set contains:
- 2 x 1.7 oz/ 50 mL evian Facial Sprays

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

Research results:
A consumer research panel of women using this product twice daily for 30 days felt improved hydration, relieved tightness, and a softer over-all feel of skin.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Mist generously after cleansing, morning and night, before applying moisturizer.
-Spray lightly after applying makeup for a smooth, blended look.
-Spray as desired throughout the day to revive color and refresh skin.
-Spray face for a hydrating base before applying face masks, facial peels, and at home spa treatments.

column8:
What it is: An award-winning lash curler with the ideal design for round-shaped eyes.

What Else You Need to Know: The 60-degree angle is designed for round-shaped eyes with a narrow top bar and wide opening designed to reach every last lash. The double-body design offers ultimate strength and control. This lash curler has a thick, rounded hypoallergenic silicone pad for hygiene. The ProCurl Lash Curler creates intense curl and won’t stick to or crease lashes.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Always curl lashes before applying mascara.
-Open eyes wide to insert and center lashes.
-With curler pad placed at base of lash line, hold handles firmly and gently squeeze.
-Hold for a few seconds, then open curler slowly to release lashes.
-Repeat up the length of lash from base to tip for an even more intense curl.
-Clean pads after use with alcohol wipe.
-With daily use, we recommend replacing curler pad after three months and curler after one year.

column8:
What it is:
A face cream that provides a high level of protection against both UVA and UVB radiation.

What it is formulated to do:
Clinique's innovative SolarSmart™ complex triggers an antiaging repair process while at once providing skin with a high level of defense from the aging and burning effects of UVA and UVB rays. The formulation also includes a boost of antioxidants to shield skin from environmental aggressors.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Gentle enough for sensitive skins, this product is water- and sweat-resistant, oil-free, non-acnegenic, and dermatologist tested.

Please note that pursant to hawaii law, as of january 1, 2021, we will no longer ship this product to the state of hawaii due to it containing the ingredient oxybenzone, octinoxate, or both.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply liberally before sun exposure and as needed.
-Reapply every 2 hours or after towel-drying, swimming or perspiring.
-Children under 6 months of age: ask a doctor.

This product creates the effect of a golden tan. Quite simply, it shows where it goes—developing in just a few hours with no surprises. The effect is smooth, natural-looking, sun-kissed color.

This oil-free product is non-acnegenic, dermatologist tested, and ideal for all skin types

-Wait 15 minutes dry-time before allowing contact with clothing or hair.

What it is:
A soothing gel cleanser.

What it is formulated to do:
Kate Somerville Gentle Daily Wash is a soothing, sulfate-free, gel facial cleanser that calms and conditions skin. An infusion of rich botanicals leaves your complexion feeling clean, smooth, and soft. The essence of lavender adds a subtle touch of serenity.

What else you need to know:
This perfect, non-irritating cleanser suits all skin types—especially sensitive skin. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.

-Apply a small amount to moist skin.
-Using circular motions, gently cleanse skin for 30 seconds.
-Rinse with warm water.
-Use twice daily, in the morning and evening.

✔ Combination

What it is:
An oil-free moisturizer that supports antiaging and smooths and hydrates skin.

Solutions for:
- Oiliness
- Dryness
- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more…
Hydration is essential for healthy, balanced, clear skin no matter the skin type. This lightweight moisturizer leaves nothing behind but smooth, supple, youthful-looking skin. Designed to hydrate while keeping oily skin in check, this unique formula is designed to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and help improve the look of elasticity, firmness, and the visible signs of aging. Moisturizing is key to achieving radiant skin, and is the integral third step in Kate's 3 Steps to Glowing Skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is free of fragrance. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply twice a day, AM and PM.
-Apply a thin, even layer to face and neck.
-Use alone or layer over your favorite Kate Somerville treatment serum.

Dispense from jar:
-Remove over-cap by gently lifting up.
-Place both thumbs evenly apart on white dispensing pump.
-Press down evenly several times to create a vacuum until product is dispensed.
-When finished, replace cap.

Moisturizing is key to achieving radiant skin, and is the integral third step in Kate's 3 Steps to Glowing Skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 This product is free of fragrance. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.
column11:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply twice a day, AM and PM. 
-Apply a thin, even layer to face and neck. 
-Use alone or layer over your favorite Kate Somerville treatment serum.
Dispense from jar:
-Remove over-cap by gently lifting up. 
-Place both thumbs evenly apart on white dispensing pump. 
-Press down evenly several times to create a vacuum until product is dispensed. 
-When finished, replace cap.

- Dullness and uneven texture
- Uneven skin tone

If you want to know more…
This bestselling Goat Milk Cream is now improved with an indulgent formula that leaves skin feeling soft, supple, and smooth. Milk polypeptides nurture sensitive and extremely dry skin, while soothing goat milk and natural milk proteins deliver deep hydration and help support the skin's natural lipid barrier. A rich blend of jojoba and avocado oils moisturize, comfort, and condition your skin for a smoother appearance. The addition of aloe helps soothe dry, sensitive skin. Clinically tested safe for sensitive skin, this gentle formula instantly absorbs to create a beautiful, healthy glow.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
For years, ancient Egyptians used goat milk to heal and nurture skin; their skin care wisdom bears following. This natural wonder continues the great tradition, lavishing skin with infusions of milk proteins, vitamins, and amino acids. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.

column8:
What it is: A dual-action exfoliator that smooths and polishes skin to reveal a natural glow; lactic acid and fruit enzymes clean clogged pores in as little as one use.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Skintone, Pores, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Scrub

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Papaya, Pineapple, and Pumpkin Enzymes: Naturally enhance skin exfoliation without overdrying.
- Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, and Silica: Lactic and salicylic acid provide chemical exfoliation while natural ingredient silica works to physically exfoliate dead skin cells from the surface.
- Aloe Vera, Honey, and Vitamin E: Help smooth and soften skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Perfected in the clinic to reveal glowing skin, Kate’s signature facial delivers four treatments—cleanser, scrub, peel, and mask—in one powerhouse product. Natural AHAs chemically exfoliate, while Silica helps with physical exfoliation to reveal smoother, brighter-looking skin in as little as two minutes.

Kate Somerville has partnered with Foster Nation to support foster youth as they age out of the system, providing professional training, workshops and mentorship, and fully funding 5+ cosmetology scholarships annually to support professional beauty career paths. For more information about Foster Nation, visit kateso.co/givingback.

Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study, after just 1 use:
- 94% of women tested showed highly significant improvement in skin texture.
- 97% of women tested showed highly significant improvement in the appearance of pores.
- 100% of women tested showed highly significant improvement in the appearance of crow’s feet, fine lines and wrinkles.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use once or twice a week AM or PM.
-Apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face, massaging in a circular motion for 30 seconds.
-Leave on for up to two minutes.
-Rinse and gently pat dry.
-This product may cause the skin to tingle and flush slightly for a short time.

What it is:
A moisturizer that supports antiaging to improve the visible signs of aging and deliver intense moisture.

What it does:
Reap the benefits of high-performing ingredients that support antiaging. This repair cream features Kate Somerville’s proprietary formula with Peptide K8™ which encourages surface cellular repair and reverses the visible signs of aging. Its Advanced Moisture Complex helps prevent water loss and leaves your skin more evenly balanced. This formula helps skin appear firmer, brighter, and more youthful looking. The integral third step in Kate Somerville’s three Steps to Glowing Skin, moisturizing is key to achieving glowing, radiant skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
"Add a small amount of Quench Hydrating Face Serum to Deep Tissue Repair before applying. This is a great nighttime routine that helps renew skin while you rest."—Kate Somerville

column8:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A cleansing oil for the face and eyes that lifts away impurities and makeup (even waterproof mascara) without stripping away skin's natural moisture.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Dullness and uneven texture

If you want to know more…
This gentle cleanser for the face and eyes is a blend of botanical oils—including green tea seed, babassu palm, and coconut oil—that dissolves and lifts away impurities and makeup (even waterproof mascara) without stripping away skin’s natural moisture. Upon contact with water, the multitasking formula transforms into a silky, non-oily emulsion that also works to improve skin luminosity and moisture retention for a smooth, glowing complexion. It is further enriched with hydrating green tea leaf extract and a radiance-boosting blend of ginseng root and white birch extract.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
AmorePacific creates luxury, high performance skincare utilizing the power of Asian botanicals. Green tea is grown and harvested by the brand and utilized in its potent formulas, along with other rare ingredients like bamboo sap, pine mushroom, and red ginseng.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Can be used daily, morning and night as needed.
-Dispense two to three pumps into palms and massage gently over dry skin.
-Moisten fingertips with water and massage over face and eyes, creating a delicate emulsion.
-Rinse thoroughly with warm water or a clean, moist face cloth.
-For use as an eye makeup remover, pump a small amount onto a moist cotton pad.
-Gently press over the eye area for a few seconds.
-Using gentle wiping motions, sweep makeup away with inward and downward motions.
-Finish with a clean, moist cotton pad.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Do not use on damaged or broken skin.
-When using this product, keep out of eyes.
-Rinse with water to remove.
-Stop use and ask doctor if rash occurs.
-Keep out of reach of children.
-If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Classic Florals

Key Notes: Pink Tulips, Green Apple, Vanilla Orchid

Fragrance Description: Giulietta is a fresh floral fragrance that beckons your inner muse. A tribute to youthful, feminine charm, Giulietta is an enchanting blend of delicate pink tulips, fresh green apples, and sweet vanilla orchid. A romantic indulgence sure to inspire great art and passion.

About the Bottle: TOCCA’s iconic fragrance bottle is inspired by the beauty of antique crystal. The decorated cap is hand finished, no two are the same. Discover TOCCA’s brand motto, "Love yourself," as a hidden message on every product.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is:
A non-drying, triple-milled soap infused with the crisp, sparkling Citron de Vigne scent.

What it does:
Made with a premium formula that has a pure vegetable oil base enriched with moisturizing shea butter for supremely soft skin. Because the soap is triple milled, there are no air pockets in the bar, making the soap dense, long lasting, and extra luxurious.

What else you need to know:
Inspired by Reims, France's Champagne region, the Citron de Vigne fragrance is a sensual blend that is ideal for both men and women. An innovative heart note of pinot noir accord—comprised of bergamot, dark almond, musk, white sandalwood, and rose—is combined with bubbling citrus top notes and an earthy base in this unique, unforgettable essence.

column8:
What it is: A dermatologist-developed foundation that create a brighter skin tone, while its creamy formula hydrates and smooths the look of skin.

Coverage: Medium

Finish: Natural

Formulation: Cream

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

SPF: SPF 15

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: Helps create a brighter skin tone. After 12 weeks of daily wear, dark spots from acne, age, and sun damage are reduced. Creamy formula hydrates and smooths, gives skin a natural finish. Broad spectrum SPF 15 protects against future discoloration. Stay-true pigments won’t change color on your skin. Sweat and humidity-resistant.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start in center of your face, blending outward.
-Build coverage as needed.
-Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover (sold separately).

-MATRIXYL® 3000: Highly effective peptide that helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles by up to 45 percent.*
-SYN®-AKE: Advanced myo-relaxing peptide smooths skin yielding up to a 52 percent reduction in the appearance of wrinkles*; mimics the activity of walgerin 1, a peptide found in the snake venom of the Temple Viper.
-RENOVAGE®: Patented anti-aging ingredient that reduces the appearance of pigmented spots by up to 56 percent and increases moisturization up to 58 percent.*
-DYNALIFT®: Natural sorghum stalk juice tightens and smooths skin.
*Based on supplier data.

column8:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
An advanced anti-aging serum that offers a daily-dose of anti-aging defense.

Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
This multifunctional anti-aging serum offers a daily-dose of anti-aging defense. The silky liquid texture is readily absorbed allowing for immediate delivery of the efficacious ingredients. Serums are intended to be used with a moisturizer or blended with another product. It is the ideal companion to any of our moisturizers (Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20, Clean Break Oil-Free Moisturizer, Dry Erase Ultra-Calming Face Cream, or Line Smoother 8% Glycolic Acid Treatment) or Post Shave Cooling Gel. Except for customers with oily skin, serums are not intended to provide adequate hydration when used alone.

Peptides are chains of amino acids (the building blocks of protein) that are essential to human life. They function as messengers in the skin, allowing the epidermis and dermis to communicate more efficiently. As we age, communication diminishes within the skin resulting in fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Peptides improve cell communication by sending specific signals that affect skin's response.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without fragrance and colorant.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-For maximum anti-aging benefits, apply to clean skin morning and night.
-Use two pumps to cover the entire face and neck before applying moisturizer, sunscreen, or post-shave products.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.
-Discontinue use if irritation develops.

column8:
What it is:
An antiaging eye cream.

What it is formulated to do:
Jack Black Protein Booster Eye Rescue is an intensive, multi-action eye treatment that delivers clinically proven antiaging technology. The high-performance complex is power-packed with peptides, antioxidants, and Omega-3 fatty acids that work to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, firm the skin, and minimize puffiness and dark circles.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Synthetic Fragrances
- Synthetic Dyes
- Petro-Chemicals
- Phthalates
- GMOs
- Triclosan

What else you need to know:
This vegan, dermatologist-tested complex contains Certified Organic ingredients and excludes PPG, MEA, TEA, DEA, and formaldehyde donors. It is not tested on animals.

Research results:
-Matrixyl® 3000 has been shown to reduce appearance of wrinkles by 45% in two months.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to cleansed skin, patting gently and evenly around eye area, avoiding eyelids.
-Use morning and night.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Avoid contact with eyes.
-If product enters eyes, rinse with water.

column8:
What it is:
A waterproof version of the bestselling Iconic mascara.

What it does:
Diorshow Iconic Waterproof Mascara adds to the bestselling Iconic mascara formula by making it waterproof and extending its wear—so lash length and volume lasts all day. Created backstage for fashion shows and celebrity red carpet events, the Iconic mascara features an oblique cut brush that gives an extra lash-curling effect. With its long, skinny teeth, the plastic comb brush allows you to precisely coat each lash one-by-one, creating a long, separated fan of lashes that usually takes the skill of a makeup artist. The extra-hold formula provides a 24 hour-curl with 100% smudge-proof results. Feel free to plunge in and play all day.

What else you need to know:
Inspired by the tailoring technique of cutting fabric on the bias to create maximum curve, the Iconic brush features soft silicone bristles that spiral around the stem to lift, curl, and separate every lash.

column8:
What it is: An iconic Dior lip balm with 97 percent natural-origin ingredients that awakens the natural color of lips with a custom glow and up to 24 hours of hydration.

Formulation Type: Lip Balm & Treatment

Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing, Plumping

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Cherry Oil: Protects against stress factors like drying.
- Shea Butter: Provides comfort and nourishment.
- Sunflower and Rice Waxes: Maintain shine.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance.

What Else You Need to Know: The iconic Dior lip balm infused with color-reviver technology that adapts to the pH of lips to reveal a custom glow for up to six hours. Featuring cherry oil, shea butter, and sunflower waxes, Lip Glow offers both custom color and lip care. It’s available in a couture case and in shades to suit all skin tones.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Can be worn on its own as a lip balm for a subtle custom color-awakening effect and up to 24 hours of hydration.
-Can be worn under the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Maximizer or Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil (both sold separately) to play with the color.

column7: Alcohol, Water, Fragrance, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Bht, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 17200/Red 33, Ci 19140/Yellow 5, Ci 42090/Blue 1.
column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Florals

Key Notes: Osmanthus, Peony, Rose

Fragrance Description: Gucci Flora is the utterly feminine, deeply sensual fragrance for women, inspired by Gucci's iconic Flora Pattern. The fragrance is characterized by contrasts and is for the classic, modern Gucci woman who has a youthful, feminine spirit.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to 9%, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14%. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

column8:
What it is:
An ultra-rich body cream enriched with 25 percent shea butter to help intensely nourish skin and moisturize for up to 72 hours.

What it is formulated to do:
With an exceptionally high concentration of shea butter, this Ultra Rich Body Cream is the perfect moisturizer for dry to very dry skin. It helps to intensely nourish, protect, and restore skin’s hydrolipidic film. Enriched with moisturizing extracts of linseed, marshmallow, sweet almond, honey, and softening apricot oil, it helps to hydrate skin for up to 72 hours. The rich texture sinks quickly into the skin to leave it soft and comfortable without any greasy residue.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Since the 1980's, L'Occitane has set up a sustainable and fair trade partnership with the women of Burkina Faso who produce shea butter. To perpetuate this story with the women of this country, the L'Occitane foundation gets involved for women's entrepreneurship in Burkina Faso supporting literacy and microcredit programs and trainings for the development of income-generating activities.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply Ultra Rich Body Cream all over your body after your shower, to comfort and nourish your skin.

column8:
What it is:
An ultra-fine, backstage-inspired, precision brow pencil.

What it does:
This retractable pencil and brush provides simple and quick brow shaping. One universal shade works for any hair color or skin tone so you can easily fill in and define brows, creating a natural and polished or daring and dramatic look.

What else you need to know:
A collection of makeup artist essentials, designed to suit all skin tones, used at the Dior runway shows, and inspired by the energy backstage.

The retractable does not require sharpening. The brush on the opposite side neatly sweeps brow hairs into place.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Define brow shape by penciling in color with feather-light strokes for a perfectly defined brow.
-Use the brush side of pencil to gently brush brow hairs up and sweep into place.
-For perfect application, twist the tip up slightly (a demi-turn is all you need).
-Always twist the tip back down after using to improve longevity and usage of product.

column8:
What it is:
A high-definition eyebrow pencil.

What it does:
Emphasize your brows with this high-definition, waterproof pencil. With its super-slim design, Amazonian Clay Waterproof Brow Pencil glides on smoothly and lasts all day thanks to Tarte’s patented, plant-wax system, which is infused with natural botanicals, aloe, vitamins A and E, and mineral pigments. This brow pencil’s petite shape allows you to perfectly mimic actual brow hair for a more natural-looking effect. This dual-ended pencil features a precision brush to help tame unruly hairs and keep your arches in place.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is waterproof, vegan, and dermatologist tested. It is free of preservatives, mineral oil, fragrances, synthetic dyes, propylene glycols, GMOs, triclosans, MEAs, DEAs, TEs, and formaldehyde donors.

What it is: A lightweight serum that minimizes the appearance of discoloration while brightening, tightening, and smoothing.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Uneven Skin Tone and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin C Ester: Provides supercharged brightening and smoothing.
- Glycolic Acid: Delivers superior exfoliation.
- Copper Complex: For powerful skin-strengthening hydration.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: Vitamin C Ester Brightening Amine Face Lift visibly brightens, tightens, and reduces the appearance of dark spots. This lightweight, fast-absorbing serum combines gentle micro-exfoliation with advanced nourishing technology in a dual-phase formula that works instantly to reveal radiant, noticeably clearer, and firmer-looking skin.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Warm a few generous drops in the hand and pat gently into the skin, focusing on areas of concern and the contours of the face.
-Make sure to apply to the hairline and up behind the ears.
-Use in the morning.

Tip: This expert formula is designed to work synergistically with High Potency Evening Repair to deliver maximum results; use High Potency Amine Complex Face Lift in the morning and High Potency Evening Repair at night.

Cardamom, Cedarwood, Courmarin.

La Nuit de L'Homme by Yves Saint Laurent tells a story of intensity, bold sensuality, and seduction that lies half-way between restraint and abandon. Bright. Fresh. Sophisticated.

column8:
What it is: An intense black mascara with a unique S-shaped curved brush that creates lifted, volumized lashes in a single coat.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: This volumizing mascara creates dramatic lashes in just one coat without clumping or flaking. The buildable, wet formula delivers a fluid and creamy application with a full-contact S-shaped brush to grasp each eyelash and evenly coat from root to tip for a more voluminous, thick lash look.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Using the full-contact brush, apply this voluminous mascara to natural eyelashes.
-With the brush curved with the eye, push into lashes and work from side to side to create the look of fuller lashes.
-Rotate brush so the curve is "cradling" the lashes, then pull straight up and out for maximum lash lift.
-Utilize the S-shaped brush to fill the base of lashes and fan outer corners for a false lash effect.
-Point wand straight up or down, push or pull the brush from the root to tips of lashes for the look of more voluminous, thickened eyelashes.

column8:
What it is: A top-selling eyelash curler that reaches even the smallest lashes for an eye-opening, glamorous look.

What else you need to know: This easy-to-use tool works for all eye shapes and features an edge-free design to prevent pinching. The unique broad curve curls lashes from inner to outer corner. Flexible silicone rubber pads are gentle and safe on lashes. Includes one replacement rubber pad.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Beauty tip:
Luscious lashes? Check. Pair with Shiseido’s ultra-rich Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Intensive Eye Contour Cream for youthful-looking eyes.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Looking down, grip the base of the lashes with the eyelash curler.
-While slowly creating an angle, squeeze the lashes approximately three times, moving from the base towards the tip.
-For a natural look, decrease pressure towards the tips.
-Wipe eyelash curler clean with tissue or dry cloth after each use.
-For best results, use before Nourishing Mascara Base and Perfect Mascara Defining Volume.

column8:
What it is: A rich lather, silicone-free shampoo that is the first step in fighting frizz.

Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily

Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick

Hair Concerns: Dryness, Frizz, and Color Safe

Formulation: Rich Liquid

Fragrance: Fresh Citrus and Fruits

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA): Blocks humidity, smooths hair, and helps repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and silicone. This product is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: No Frizz Shampoo is powered by Living Proof’s patented healthy hair molecule (OFPMA), which in this formula does three things: blocks humidity, smooths hair, and helps repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer. The result: your hair will look and feel smooth and soft and will stay refreshed.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Clinical Results: Patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA):
- 70% more effective than traditional silicone products at blocking humidity
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to wet hair.
-Lather.
-Rinse.
-Follow with No Frizz Conditioner.
-Color safe and safe for chemically treated hair.

Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily

What Else You Need to Know: No Frizz Conditioner Mini is powered by Living Proof’s patented healthy hair molecule (OFPMA), that helps block humidity, smooth hair, and repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer.

column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Start with No Frizz Shampoo (sold separately).
-Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on mid-shaft to ends.
-Spread evenly throughout hair.
-Rinse.
-Follow with one of Living Proof’s No Frizz styling products (sold separately).

column8:
What it is: A luxurious, hydrating lipstick that comes in three finishes (sheer, cream, and matte), lasts up to eight-hours, and is rich in antioxidants.

What Else You Need to Know: This lipstick is infused with moisturizing Pro-Xylane™ and vitamin E and leaves lips feeling replenished, soft, and comfortable. Satin Color™ Complex allows for an even deposit of color upon application, while its pigments last for up to eight hours of wear. It is also non-drying, non-flaking, and non-caking.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Using Le Lipstique Lip Liner, draw the edges of lips.
-Follow by filling the center of the lips and contouring, if desired.
-For extra long-lasting wear, check out this application tip by Lancôme PRO Makeup Artist German Moyano.
-Make sure lips are hydrated.
-Exfoliate lips with Lancôme's Exfoliating Rose Sugar Scrub.
-Prime lips with a small amount of foundation.
-Using Le Lip Liner, draw a line around the edges of your mouth. For a fuller lip look, use lip liner and over line lips.
-Using liner, fill in a quarter way from the edge of the mouth towards the center.
-Apply L'Absolu Rouge lipstick.
-Blot.
-Set with a light dusting of Long Time No Shine Loose Setting Powder in Translucent or a spritz of Fix It Forget Setting Spray.
-Apply second coat of L'Absolut Rouge lipstick.

Satin Color™ Complex allows for an even deposit of color upon application, while its pigments last for up to eight hours of wear. It is also non-drying, non-flaking, and non-caking.

column8:
What it is: An award-winning, waterproof liquid eyeliner with all-day wear and opaque pigment that creates ultra-precise lines inspired by tattoo artistry.

Ingredient Callouts: It is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Shake before use to keep the ink flowing. Store tip-down so the brush stays saturated. The high-pigment vegan formula is smudge-resistant and lasts all day. Push your artistry to the limit: The ultra-fine brush tip lets you create graphic lines, iconic winged liner, faux freckles, body art and more.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Storage tip: Always store tip-down so the brush stays saturated.
-Shake before use to keep the formula flowing.
-Still feeling dry? Wipe tip with a damp tissue to remove eyeshadow buildup.
-When applying, use very light pressure for fine, exact lines (perfect for creating sharp cat-eyeliner wings).
-Add more pressure to create a thicker, bold eyeliner look.
-The formula is also great for layering, so you can keep drawing over your lines until you achieve liner perfection.

How to Fake Freckles:
-Using shade Mad Max Brown (sold separately), make small dots wherever you want your faux freckles.
-Then use your fingers to tap the product into skin and make freckles appear more natural.
-For deeper skin tones, let the dots sit on skin for a few seconds before tapping.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Florals

Scent Type: Fruity Floral

Key Notes: Watermelon Accord, Kiwi, Pink Cyclamen

Fragrance Description: 3 L’IMPERATRICE is a strong, vibrant perfume with notes of kiwi, pink cyclamen, and sandalwood.

About the Bottle: The purity and simplicity of the transparent bottle allows the delicate blush hue of the fragrance to take center stage, evoking the powerful femininity of the scent within. The bottle has a refined, rectilinear silhouette topped with a minimalistic black cap and grounded by a linear glass base. It comes housed in a white box embellished only with the DOLCE&GABBANA monogram—an emblem of modern elegance.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

column8:
What it is: A foundation with buildable coverage for a finish that enhances the look of skin, without masking the natural complexion.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Coverage: Medium

Finish: Natural

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal and Dry

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin C: Brightens skin and diminishes the look of discoloration.
- Turmeric: Enhances skin radiance and evens the look of skin tone.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of mineral oil, sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehyde, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, and fragrance. This product is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Powered by the NARS’s Complexion Brightening Formula, this foundation evens the complexion, while improving the look of skin’s texture and brightness. Powerful antioxidants protect against damaging free radicals, while glycerin attracts and holds moisture.

Clinical Results: In an independent consumer study on 24 participants after 4 weeks:
- 96% said it evened out skin tone
- 92% said skin felt moisturized
- 92% said skin looked brighter and more radiant
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Always warm liquid foundation in the hand and apply with fingertips; this creates the most natural-looking finish.
-Start where more coverage is needed (typically in the center of the face) and work out toward the edge of the face.
-A great clean-up tool, the #12 Cream Blending Brush (sold separately) is ideal for applying foundation under the eyes and around the lips to make sure lines are crisp and perfect.

What it is: A soothing, oil-free cream with specialized ingredients that break apart surface darkening, exfoliating it away.

Skin Type: Dry and Combination

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture and Uneven Skin Tone

Formulation: Lightweight Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Octisalate 5%
- Avobenzone 3%
- Octocrylene 2.7%

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, oil, and fragrance.

What Else You Need to Know: Wear this calming cream daily to see a more even, healthy-looking skin tone. This product is allergy tested.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply mornings to face after using Even Better™ Clinical Dark Spot Corrector.
-See visible results in about four to six weeks.

Tips:
-Follow with Even Better Makeup SPF 15 for a perfect finish.
-Can also be used on chest and hands.

column8:
What it is: A fragrance-free, gentle cleanser that effectively removes makeup, dirt, and grime, leaving skin soft and supple.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Pores, and Redness

Formulation: Lightweight Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Aloe: Helps calm, soothe, and nurture skin.
- Allantoin: Helps calm and soothe skin.
- Glycerin: A natural humectant that helps hydrate and smooth skin's appearance.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This non-stripping, pH-balanced formula helps maintain skin’s natural acidity and reduce flare-ups. The sumptuous, creamy texture never leaves skin tight or dry. Infused with a powerful antioxidant blend, it helps safeguard skin against environmental aggressors while also calming irritated skin.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Dampen face and dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips.
-Gently massage onto all areas of the face.
-Remove with water or a soft, damp washcloth.
-Use twice daily, morning and night.

column8:
What it is:
A concealer that hides all imperfections and awakens the skin's youthfulness in a single step.

What it does:
Guerlain's new Precious Light Rejuvenating Illuminator hides all imperfections and awakens the skin's youthfulness with a single click of its magic wand brush. This must-have makeup tool employs an exclusive double-sided Gold Radiance Pigment: The opaque side targets imperfections and dull zones, toning down the appearance of wrinkles, dilated pores, and pigment irregularities, while the golden side reflects light. It contains a blend of myrrh oil, known for its regenerating properties, and lifting and soothing peptides, which together diminish the appearance of fine lines and create smoother, softer skin that lasts.

It contains a blend of myrrh oil, known for its regenerating properties, and lifting and soothing peptides, which together diminish the appearance of fine lines and create smoother, softer skin that lasts.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Florals

Scent Type: Classic Florals

Key Notes: Magnolia, Calabrian Bergamot, Sandalwood

Fragrance Description: Inspired by the beautiful palazzo gardens of Italy's majestic Lake Como region, Magnolia Nobile represents the expression of natural and understated elegance. Created with the purest essences, Magnolia Nobile is an eau de parfum that reveals the most noble and refined aspects of the magnolia. Top notes of Italian bergamot, lemon, and citron blend seamlessly with magnolia accord, a rare ingredient extracted with time and dedication. The heart evolves with notes of rose, jasmine, and tuberose and the base notes unfold with sandalwood, patchouli, vetiver, and vanilla. The resulting unique and enveloping harmony creates an unforgettable, captivating effect.

column8:
What it is:
A primer for concealers and eyeshadows.

What it does:
This dual-action power primer works 360 degrees around the eyes to make concealers and eyeshadows stay put. Concealers don't crease; eyeshadows stay vibrant and true. Now in two neutral shades to suit all skin tones, Stay Don’t Stray features a new dip-n-dab wand for easier application. Remember: just a dab'll do ya!

What else you need to know:
Sodium hyaluronate is known to hydrate, while vitamins C and E are known to help fight signs of aging.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply three tiny dots under your eyes and blend.
-Next, apply three dots on eyelids and blend.
-Let set, then apply concealers and eyeshadows as usual.
-Beauty tip: wear it alone to help even out eyelid discoloration and under eye-circles. It’s perfect for the no-makeup look.

Precautions:
-Please read the ingredient list on the packaging to be sure it is appropriate for your personal use.

column8:
What it is:
An easy-application, waterproof liquid liner that stays on all day and night.

What it does:
This easy-glide, quick-dry precision liner stays in place until you say when—no smudges, feathering, or running. The thin, marker-like tip is easy to use, even for the beauty beginner, and delivers any look—from a thin line to a bold, dramatic stroke. It goes on smoothly without skipping, smudging, or pulling, and lasts all day.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake well before use.
-Before lining, pull gently on the upper corner of the eye area to stretch and smooth the area. This will make it easier to line and eliminate bleeding.
-Apply the liner as close to the lashes as possible. In order to avoid a gap between the lashes and the lining, try painting the liner into the lashes using small, feathering strokes.
-Store horizontally for best performance.

It goes on smoothly without skipping, smudging, or pulling, and lasts all day.

column8:
What it is: A lightweight thickening cream made with just a hint of conditioning for naturally full, soft hair to pump up hair’s volume and softness.

Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, and Curly

Hair Texture: Fine

Hair Concerns:
- Dryness
- Volume

Key Benefits:
- Makes fine hair look and feel thicker
- Provides long-lasting, touchable body, fullness, and thickness
- Provides light conditioning

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Thickening Molecule: Deposits microscopic thickening dots between strands so hair looks and feels fuller.
- Myristyl Alcohol: Provides lightweight conditioning.
- Emollient blend: Enhances softness and shine.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This cream is powered by Living Proof’s patented thickening molecule, which creates space between each strand with tiny dots that deliver big body. The result? Hair that looks and feels thicker with a hint of conditioning for touchable softness.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-A little goes a long way—start small and add more as needed.
-Apply a dime-size amount to damp hair from mid-lengths to ends.
-Avoid roots.
-Blow dry.
-Use a round brush for maximum body and fullness.
-Finding the right amount can take some experimentation. It is possible to use too much Full Thickening Cream, so if your hair feels greasy, reduce the amount you are using. If you don't feel the thickening effects, increase the amount you're using—a dime-size amount at a time.
-For curly hair, if you would like light conditioning, Living Proof recommends using Full Thickening Cream. If you are looking for light hold for your curls, Living Proof recommends Full Thickening Mousse (sold separately).
-In order to get the best results, use with Living Proof Full Shampoo and Conditioner (each sold separately).
-If your hair is especially dry or damaged, applying Living Proof No Frizz Leave-In Conditioner (sold separately) to dry, damaged areas before applying Full Thickening Cream is recommended.

column8:
What it is:
A pressed powder that visibly eliminates shine and controls oil breakthrough to maintain a fresh, matte finish with the naturally derived Shine Control Complex.

What it does:
Laura Mercier Smooth Focus Pressed Setting Powder - Shine Control is a lightweight, oil-free powder that visibly eliminates shine and produces a fresh, matte complexion. The naturally derived Shine Control Complex controls oil breakthrough and the ultra-sheer, mint green shade works to correct redness and visibly even out the skin tone. It's ideal for touch-ups throughout the day as it keeps your complexion flawless and shine-free.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This product is dermatologist tested and does not contain fragrances or talc.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
Touch-Up Application:
-Begin with the sponge side of the applicator by picking up the powder from the compact using a dabbing motion.
-Lightly press onto the back of the hand to evenly disperse the product into the applicator.
-Next, using a light patting motion, gently press the powdered sponge onto the oily areas of the face; focusing on the forehead, cheeks and chin.
-As a finishing step, use the flocked, puff side of the applicator to softly buff away any excess powder for a matte, flawless finish.
Preventative Application:
For those with extremely oily skin, lightly dust Smooth Focus Pressed Setting Powder - Shine Control over foundation using the Finishing Brush before color application.

Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands

Key Notes: Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Patchouli

Fragrance Description: This floral perfume for women explodes with an intoxicating whirl of cattleya, jasmine, and rose. The warm scent of patchouli and vanilla grounds the fresh fragrance, adding a sensual twist on the scent reminiscent of a room filled with rose petals.

About the Bottle: The instantly recognizable grenade fragrance bottle displays the soft-pink hue of the floral women's perfume within, contrasting the harsh shape with a distinctly feminine scent encapsulated within.

About the Fragrance: This luxe feminine perfume is a veritable summer garden party in a bottle. Exploding with floral scents of rosebud and jasmine accented by a warm patchouli and vanilla cologne base, this perfume for women exudes classic femininity through warm floral fragrances.

This fragrance is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

column8:
Fragrance Family:
Floral

Scent Type:
Powdery Florals

Key Notes:
Peony, Rose, Honey, Cedarwood

About:
Chloé Eau de Parfum captures the creative, confident individuality of the Chloé woman. It is a fresh and feminine fragrance suited to a free spirit with an utterly innate sense of chic.

The scent takes the classic rose and ingeniously translates it into a vibrant perfume, intimate and sensual. Chloé Eau de Parfum begins with a combination of floral powdery notes: hints of peony, lychee, and springtime freesia. The airy, flirtatious head notes drift away to reveal the richer and more sensual side of the rose. The distinctive character of this unique rose is accompanied by magnolia and lily of the valley, as well as subtle intimations of warm amber and elegant cedarwood.

The fragrance is enclosed in a modern, delicately pleated bottle adorned with a hand-tied ribbon.

What else you need to know:
Freedom, lightness and femininity: these are the principles on which Chloé was founded in Paris more than 60 years ago. Today Chloé’s vision of romantic, effortless chic lives in ready-to-wear, accessories, and fragrances.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

column8:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Florals

Key Notes: Osmanthus, Peony, Rose

Fragrance Description: Gucci Flora is the utterly feminine, deeply sensual fragrance for women inspired by Gucci's iconic Flora Pattern. The fragrance is characterized by contrasts and is for the classic, modern Gucci woman who has a youthful, feminine spirit.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. 
-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to 9%, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14%. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.
