column8:
What it is: A teeth-whitening device set that combines professional-grade, patented heat and light technology to visibly whiten teeth without sensitivity.

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture

What Else You Need to Know: The GLO Heat and LED Light Whitening Mouthpiece is the only at-home teeth whitening device to use patented heat and light technology for faster results without pain. It works in fast, eight-minute applications to whiten the look of your teeth up to five shades or more, while the appearance of stains is removed. It connects wirelessly to the GLO Whitening App so you can schedule treatments, get reminders, track progress, and more. This FDA-registered device was invented by a dentist and trusted by thousands of dental practices, and it is safe for crowns, bridges, and veneers.

All GLO device components are covered by a one-year limited warranty.

This Set Contains:
- GLO Heat and LED Light Whitening Mouthpiece
- Mouthpiece storage case
- Bluetooth-enabled, USB, rechargeable power pack with hands-free lanyard and garment clip
- 7 x 0.1 oz/ 2.95 mL Teeth Whitening Gel GLO Vials
- 0.3 oz/ 8 mL GLO Lip Balm and Treatment
- Travel pouch
- User manual and shade guide

Clinical Results: In a research study of 14 participants ages 23 to 40, after 7 days of use 3 times per day:
- 100% got whiter teeth with an average improvement of five shades
- 100% said it was easy to use
- 100% reported little to no sensitivity
column9:
Suggested Usage:
GLO Lip Balm and Treatment:
-Apply hydrating and nourishing to lips.

Teeth Whitening Gel GLO Vials and GLO Heat and LED Light Whitening Mouthpiece:
-Pull cap off and squeeze a small bead of whitening gel—half a pea-size amount for each arch—onto brush-tip applicator.
-Brush thin layer of gel on top and bottom teeth, fronts only.
-Insert mouthpiece into mouth and illuminate by pressing the silver button on the power pack or by using the GLO Whitening App.
-Mouthpiece will turn off after eight minutes when application is complete.
-Reapply whitening gel to teeth and repeat.
-For best results, complete three consecutive whitening applications each day for seven to 14 days or until desired results are achieved.
-Do not eat or drink for 20 minutes after application.
-Avoid food/drink that can stain teeth during whitening treatment and for 48 hours after final application.
-Maintain your white smile with monthly touch-up sessions and full treatments every six months.

column2: Extra GLO Teeth Whitening Device Mouthpiece and Case
column8:
What it is:
An extra GLO teeth whitening mouthpiece for use with any GLO Teeth Whitening Device. Lets you share your device with another member of your household. Requires GLO Device and whitening gel GLO Vials, sold separately.

If you want to know more…
The patented GLO Mouthpiece illuminates with a brilliant blue LED light as it gently warms to amplify the effects of the whitening gel, for a whiter, brighter smile with no sensitivity. One size fits all and whitens top and bottom teeth at the same time.

This set contains:
- GLO Heat & LED Light Mouthpiece
- Storage Case

What else you need to know:
This product is latex-free.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use with GLO Control according to package instructions.
-Rinse mouthpiece with warm water after each whitening application and before returning mouthpiece to case after use.

Precautions:
-Note: mouthpiece will only work when plugged into a charged control unit and the GLO button is pressed.

column2: SinglePass Compact Travel Styling Flat Iron with Cap (White & Rose Gold)
column8:
What it is: A flat iron with full styling capability in a portable size.

Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily

Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick

What Else You Need to Know: From straightening to curling, the SinglePass Compact offers full styling capability in a portable size with the added convenience of a heat-resistant cap for quick storage and ease of travel. With T3 SinglePass® technology and custom blend ceramic plates, this iron ensures even, optimal heat to straighten hair in just one pass and create a frizz-free, shiny finish that lasts. This styling iron can be stored at the office for quick touch-ups or inside your purse, gym bag, or carry-on luggage, ensuring your tresses stay perfectly styled no matter where your busy schedule or travels take you. It’s perfect for styling at home or on the go.

column8:

What it is:
A lightweight gel-cream formula that provides rich hydration to the delicate eye area and promotes a more radiant look.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Puffiness
- Dark circles

If you want to know more…
This gel-cream quickly absorbs to moisturize the delicate eye area, while also helping to minimize the appearance of puffiness and dark circles. The unique gel to cream formula creates a thin external layer on the skin and helps it retain plenty of moisture for a long time. Hesperidin—predominant in citrus fruit peels—helps decrease the appearance of dark circles, while caffeine helps reduce visible swelling.

AMOREPACIFIC's exclusive formulation, 5-Hydra Complex™, helps to support skin’s moisture barrier while bamboo sap delivers rich hydration. MOISTURE BOUND is also formulated with AMOREPACIFIC's advanced Radiance Eye Complex™, which promotes a more radiant look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Steeped in centuries of Korean heritage, AMOREPACIFIC has unearthed the extraordinary skin-health benefits of Asian botanicals, channeling these ingredients into luxurious, high-performance anti-aging skincare.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Use morning and evening after MOISTURE BOUND Rejuvenating Serum (sold separately).
-Apply product on the orbital bone surrounding the eye.
-Gently tap under-eye areas and smooth product on browbone.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad-spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and take other sun protection measures including: limiting time in the sun, especially between 10am–2pm, and wearing long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses.
-For children under six months of age, ask a doctor.
-Protect the product in container from excessive heat and direct sun.

✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
An intensely hydrating daily serum with the power of bamboo leaf extract.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Dullness

If you want to know more…
This serum offers an intensely hydrating treatment that diminishes the appearance of early signs of aging. The 24-hour time-release formula replaces water with highly concentrated bamboo sap that provides long-lasting hydration upon application and is further enriched with the patented 5-Hydra Complex™. This hard-working blend of Asian botanicals boosts hydration, optimizes moisture levels, visibly smooths texture, and supports skin’s natural antioxidants, all while addressing signs of fine lines and wrinkles. It is an essential step to any youth-preserving skincare regimen.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
AmorePacific creates luxury high-performance skincare utilizing the power of Asian botanicals. Green tea is grown and harvested by the brand and utilized in its potent formulas along with other rare ingredients like bamboo sap, pine mushroom, and red ginseng.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Can be used daily, morning and night.
-Dispense one or two pumps onto the fingertips and massage over the face and neck, avoiding the eye area.

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-When using this product, keep out of eyes.
-Rinse with water to remove.
-Stop use and ask doctor if rash or irritation develops or lasts.
-Keep out of reach of children.
-If swallowed, get medical help or contact poison control center right away.

column8:
What it is:
A concentrated serum that refines pores.

What it is formulated to do:
This product helps skin create a smoother, younger look. Pores seem smaller, as if they had 'snapped back' into shape. It contains the Pore Resurfacing Complex, which quickly and gently clears out debris and rough flakes. Over time, skin creates stronger supports for a tighter, smoother, younger look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This product is oil-free and ideal for all skin types.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Spread over face morning and night after 3-Step routine.
-Lightweight, oil-free serum can be layered with other treatments, makeup, or Instant Perfector.
-For all skin types.

column8:
What it is:
An oil-free serum formulated to minimize wrinkles, boost radiance, and rebuild skin firmness in 10 days.

What it is formulated to do:
This antiaging serum contains a high concentration of the revolutionary microalgae-based ingredient Alguronic Acid. Within just four weeks of use, it minimizes wrinkles, leaving your skin looking radiant and noticeably younger looking.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This oil-free serum is non-comedogenic and has not been tested on animals. It has been dermatologist tested and is recommended for all skin types. For best results, follow with your favorite daily moisturizer.

While pursuing renewable energy solutions, a biotechnology laboratory in San Francisco unexpectedly discovered the powerful regenerative properties of Alguronic Acid. Available only in Algenist products, this bioactive compound joins other powerful antiaging active ingredients, including a peptide and an algal-based alternative to retinol. These ingredients come together to create a powerful serum that rebuilds skin firmness while restoring its density and elasticity.

Research results:
In comparison testing, Alguronic Acid outperformed other well-known active antiaging ingredients, demonstrating superior antiaging benefits. Average results measured following an in vitro test with Alguronic Acid:
- 55% increase in cellular regeneration
- 32% increase in elastin synthesis
- 26% decrease in melanin production

Following a self-assessment of 100 women, within 10 days of daily use:
- 86% of subjects saw restored skin density (suppleness, elasticity)
- 93% of subjects saw boosted skin radiance

Within 4 weeks of daily use:
- 78% of subjects saw minimized deep wrinkles
- 81% of subjects saw noticeably tightened and lifted skin
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, apply to the entire face, neck, and décolleté.
-Follow with your favorite moisturizer.
-Repeat this routine twice a day.

A moisturizer with the exclusive antiaging ingredient Alguronic Acid.

What it is formulated to do:
This lotion's luxurious texture provides immediate moisture while other antiaging and hydrating ingredients release over time to nourish and regenerate the skin. The revolutionary microalgae-based ingredient Alguronic Acid works to minimize wrinkles, leaving your skin looking radiant and noticeably younger.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
While pursuing renewable energy solutions, a biotechnology laboratory in San Francisco unexpectedly discovered the powerful regenerative properties of Alguronic Acid, the bioactive compound available only in Algenist products.

Research results:
In comparison testing, Alguronic Acid outperformed other well-known active antiaging ingredients, demonstrating superior antiaging benefits. Average results measured following an in vitro test with Alguronic Acid:
- 55% increase in cellular regeneration
- 32% increase in elastin synthesis
- 26% decrease in melanin production
Following a self-assessment of 100 women, within 10 days of daily use:
- Skin density (suppleness, elasticity) is restored in 86% of subjects.
- Skin radiance is boosted in 93% of subjects.
Within 4 weeks of daily use:
- Deep wrinkles are minimized in 78% of subjects.
- Skin is noticeably tightened and lifted in 81% of subjects.

-Apply to the entire face, neck and chest area twice a day.
-Use only as directed.

Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A nutrient-rich, all-natural cleanser with nourishing argan oil to melt away makeup and deeply hydrate skin.

Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Pores
- Acne and blemishes

If you want to know more…
This effective, nourishing cleansing oil blend transforms into a luscious milk that dissolves makeup and impurities while restoring skin’s natural moisture and pH balance. Sunflower, safflower, and grape seed oils cleanse the skin's surface without stripping it of essential moisture, leaving skin replenished, clarified, and refreshed. Ideal for all skin types, the gentle yet powerful cleansing actives leaves skin feeling moisturized—never tight or dry.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without GMO, formaldehyde, and synthetic fragrance.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
column9:
Suggested Usage:
-Massage three to four pumps onto dry skin for two to three minutes using dry hands.
-Then, wet face with warm water to transform the oil into a rich milk.
-Rinse thoroughly, pat skin dry, and embrace refreshed, balanced skin.
